GSP33nysu__2u:751: nahi pipīlikālipeḥ puruṣaliperasti kaścidviśeṣo yena neyaṃ pipīlikālipiriti niścinuyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:760: lipidarśanādikaṃ tu saṃskāro dvedhābhidhasahakārisampādanenaiva caritārthamiti kathaṃ tasya prāmāṇyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:764: tathāca cakṣuṣa ivārthopasarpaṇatatsaṃyogasahitasya prāmāṇyamevaṃ lipidarśanatadudbuddhasaṃskārasahitasyaiva manasa iti kathaṃ na lipeḥ prāmāṇyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:767: nanvatra pramāṇaśabdo bhāvasādhano vā syātkāraṇasādhano vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:768: ādye pipīlikālipiḥ pramāṇamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:777: nanu ca śruteḥ samyaganubhavasādhanatvena prāmāṇyamiṣyaṃ natu smārakatvena /
GSP33nysu__2u:778: tathāca na śrutiḥ samyaganubhavasādhanabuddhipūrvakatvātpipīlikālipivadityanumāsyata ityata āha- yatheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:782: yathābuddhipūrvakamapyekenolūkena kṛtamanekakākanāśanamaśvatthāmno 'hameka evānekānvadhiṣyāmītyasyārthasya bodhakaṃ samyaganubhavaṃ prati sādhanaṃ jātam /
GSP33nysu__2u:786: sāditve 'pi buddhijanyatvābhāvo vā pratipādyātharbuddhipūrvakatvābhāvo vānenaitadevaṃ pratipādayiṣyāmītyabhisandhipūrvakatāvaidhuryaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:797: anumānamātre suvaco 'pi cetanavyāpāraviṣayasya tathābhūta eva śākune pradarśayitumucita iti na pradarśitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:800: yattu pramāṇāviruddhaṃ tadvayabhicārasthalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhāvenoktam- aviruddhamiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:804: vibhaktipratirūpakaṃ cāvyayaṃ bhavatīti vacanādavyayametaditi na doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:815: na conmattavākyamapi pramāṇaṃ pramāṇaviruddhatvādityata āha- viruddhaṃ tviti //
GSP33nysu__2u:818: pramāṇaviruddhaṃ yadunmattavākyaṃ tat pramāṇavirodhādeva bādhitamayathārthamiti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:835: nanvasyopādheryadayathārthaṃ tatpramāṇaviruddhamiti sādhyavyāpakatve 'pi sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ kathamityata āha- virodheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:851: yadvā vedo yathārtho bodhakatve sati pramāṇāviruddhatvātpratyakṣavat /
GSP33nysu__2u:854: evaṃ vākyatvāvacchinne sādhye 'nāptapraṇītatvamupādhistadviparyayeṇa ca pratipakṣo 'bhidheya iti / *5,103*
GSP33nysu__2u:859: yena prāmāṇyamavadhārya phalavyabhicāramanyathā neṣyāma ityata āha- tanmūlatvāditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:866: tathāpi tamanusṛtya racitatvaṃ tanmūlatvamiha vivakṣitamiti noktadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:874: sati caivaṃ smṛtīnāṃ prāmāṇye tadbalena phalavyabhicāro 'pyanyathayitavya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:876: teṣāṃ prāmāṇyasādhane ca bahuviplavaḥ syādityata āha- virodha iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:880: yāsāṃ smṛtīnāṃ sarvathā pramāṇavirodho nāsti tāsāmeva pakṣīkaraṇānna kaściddoṣa ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:885: vedamūlatvena tu prāmāṇye siddhe na ko 'pi doṣa iti / *5,107*
GSP33nysu__2u:893: virodho 'pi sa evoktaḥ pratyakṣeṇāgamena vā // MAnuv_2,1.16cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:898: virodhādeva bādhitamityaprāmāṇyaprayojakatayokto virodho 'pi sa eva yaḥ pratyakṣeṇāgamena vā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:901: aprāmāṇyaprayojakatayā yadasmābhirabhihitaṃ tatpakṣe 'pyupapādayituṃ khalu parasyāyaṃ prayatnaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:905: nanu pramāṇavirodha evāprāmāṇye prayojako 'stu kiṃ pratyakṣeṇāgamena veti viśeṣaṇena /
GSP33nysu__2u:908: vakṣyāmo hyatra brahmādivastuṣu pramāṇaṃ veda evaika iti vaidike 'rthe 'numānasyānavakāśam /
GSP33nysu__2u:909: yatra ca yasyāpraveśo na tasya tadbādhakam /
GSP33nysu__2u:916: tarhi vedārthamīmāṃsā nārambhaṇīyā syāt mīmāṃsāyā yuktyanusandhānātmakatavādityata āha- āgameneti //
GSP33nysu__2u:923: naca dharmyādirūpaṃ brahmādikaṃ vedādṛte siddhayatīti tadanapekṣāyāmāśrayāsiddhayādikam,
GSP33nysu__2u:924: apekṣāyāṃ tu virodhino dharmyādigrāhakavirodha ityevaṃ vaidike 'rthe 'numānasyānavakāśo 'bhidhistitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:925: mīmāṃsāyāṃ tu kvacidāgamasyāgamāntareṇa virodha evārthanirṇayārthaṃ yuktirupādīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:936: api ca pratyakṣāgamavirodho 'pi na svarūpeṇāprāmāṇyaṃ prayojayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:937: kintu tayorupajīvyatvādinā prābalye satyeva durbalayoḥ svayaṃ bādhitatvena samabalayoḥ pratibandhamātrahetutvenāprāmāṇyaniścayānupapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:950: ataśca na tadvirodhena vedasyāprāmāṇyaṃ mantavyamityāśayenāha- pratyakṣamiti // *5,111*
GSP33nysu__2u:960: ityādivedaṃ prati niraniṣyo niravadya ityādestasya vedo(dasyo)
GSP33nysu__2u:962: evaṃ niravakāśatvādikamapi pratyakṣāgamayoreva prāyeṇa sambhavati yuktestu kvacideva /
GSP33nysu__2u:968: nahi sarvatrāgamayoḥ parasparavirodha eva mīmāṃsāvatāryata ityata āha- yukta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:974: tathāpi yatra naivaṃ tatraikasyaivāgamasyānekārthapratītau yuktyanusāriṇamarthamupādāya tadanuguṇatadviruddhārthaparityāgaḥ kriyata iti noktaniyamabhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:984: yadvā yatsiddhavatkṛtya tatra mīmāṃsārambhānupapattiḥ parihṛtā tadidānīṃ darśayitumāha- yuktiśceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:987: vyāptiḥ pratyakṣatā yasyā yuktigā'gamagā tathā // MAnuv_2,1.20ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:989: yasyā yukteḥ sādhyena vyāptiḥ pratyakṣagā pratyakṣāvagatā saikā /
GSP33nysu__2u:990: yuktigā yuktyavagatā yasyā vyāptiḥ sā dvitīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:991: tathā'gamagā āgamāvagatā yasyā vyāptiḥ sā tṛtīyeti /
GSP33nysu__2u:997: evaṃ tarhi yā yuktimūlā yuktiḥ sā nāgamādyupajīvinīti tasya bādhikā /
GSP33nysu__2u:1007: tathāca pratyakṣādyapekṣatvena sāmye 'pi bahusaṃvidhānānapekṣayoḥ pratyakṣāgamamūlayoryuktyoḥ prabalatvaṃ tadapekṣāyāstu yuktimūlāyā durbalatvaṃ yuktameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:1021: ata eva pramāṇalakṣaṇādau nirūpitasyārthasya punaratra nirūpaṇaṃ na doṣāya /
GSP33nysu__2u:1028: vasara ityataḥ pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ prathamaṃ tāvadāha- yāthārthyameveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:1056: evaṃ tarhi lakṣyāpekṣayā bhinnādvayavaccheda ityevocyatāṃ kṛtaṃ jñānatvādinā sājātyena prakṛtānupayoginā varṇitena /
GSP33nysu__2u:1057: yadā ca lakṣyādanyatva pareṣāmavagataṃ tadā parebhyo 'nyatvamapi lakṣyasyārthādavagamyata iti siddhamagrato lakṣaṇaprayojanamiti vaiyarthyameva syāllakṣaṇākhyānasya / *5,125*
GSP33nysu__2u:1059: api ca na tāvadanena lakṣaṇenānavagatenaiva vyavacchinnapratītisambhavaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1065: nāpi kāryeṇa liṅgena tadanupapattyā vā tadavagamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1075: prathamabhāvitayāvaśyābhyupeyatayā laghorupāyātsādhyasiddhau sambhavatyāṃ caramabhāvitayā avaśyānuṣṭheyatvābhāvena gurāvupāye pravartamānasya tavaivedaṃ (dūṣaro)
GSP33nysu__2u:1077: pradīpe pradīpaṃ prajvālya tamonirāsāya yatamānasyaiva puṃsaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1091: yatra liṅgamavyāpakatvānnāsti tatra lakṣaṇasya pramāṇābhāvātpratyetumaśakyatvena kathaṃ tataḥ prāmāṇyādyavagamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1095: atha yatra tallakṣaṇe liṅgaṃ nāsti tatra liṅgāntarātpratyetavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1102: lakṣyānumānasya lakṣaṇaprayojanasyobhābhyāmeva siddheḥ kṛtaṃ vyāpakena tena / *5,135*
GSP33nysu__2u:1118: sāsnādimāngauriti viditalakṣaṇasambandho hi yaṃ piṇḍaṃ sāsnādimantaṃ paśyati taṃ nāyamaśvādirnāpi ghaṭādiriti pratipādyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1122: atha lakṣyapratītinirapekṣameva lakṣaṇena vyavacchedo bodhyata iti matam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1129: asaṅkīrṇatayā gopiṇḍaṃ paśyannapi hi na tāvadayaṃ nāśvo na ghaṭa iti pratyeti yāvallakṣaṇaṃ nāvagacchati /
GSP33nysu__2u:1139: yathā yathārthajñānatatsādhanasya pramāṇasya jñānaṃ tatsādhanaṃ ca sajātīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1144: evaṃ tarhi lakṣyāpekṣayā bhinnādvayavaccheda ityuktaṃ syāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1146: nahi ko 'pi svasthātmā svasmādeva vyavacchedaṃ lakṣaṇaprayojanamācakṣati(ṣye) / *5,140*
GSP33nysu__2u:1150: vastuto yallakṣyādbhinnaṃ tato vyavacchedāvagamārthatvāllakṣaṇasya pratipādakasya yadyapi lakṣyānyatvajñānamalakṣye(vaśyā)
GSP33nysu__2u:1155: jñānaṃ vinā lakṣyasya alakṣyānyatvajñānaṃ lakṣaṇaprayojanaṃ na siddhayatīti kaścit /
GSP33nysu__2u:1165: yatra liṅgāttadavagamastatra tata eva lakṣaṇaprayojanasiddhervyarthā parasparākusṛṣṭiriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:1194: tatrādyaṃ lakṣyasvarūpapratipattikāraṇaṃ bhavat tasyānvayo vyavacchedatacchabdavyavahartavyate ca pratipādayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:1212: yastu kāṣṭhaloṣṭhayitaḥ kañcitpadārthaṃ vā kasyacitkiñcicchabdavācyatvaṃ vā na vetti nāsau lakṣaṇaśāstre'dhikriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1227: antye kimidaṃ tvadabhidhānamāptopadeśatayā lakṣaṇaṃ bodhayatyuta liṅgādibhāvena /
GSP33nysu__2u:1237: sa hi sarvasya śāstrasya kartāramāptameva manyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1240: yadi na prativādinaṃ prati śāstraṃ kintu śiṣyaṃ prati tadā pratijñāmātrādevāptavacanācchiṣyasyārthaniścayopapatterhetvādyabhidhānamanarthakatāmāpannaṃ śāstre /
GSP33nysu__2u:1243: lakṣaṇavākyaṃ tu śiṣyameva prati prayojakaṃ pratipannaśāstrakārāptabhāvamiti manyase /
GSP33nysu__2u:1246: asti hi samayagrāhakaṃ śāstraṃ munibhiḥ praṇītaṃ nāmaliṅgānuśāsanavyākaraṇādīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1251: naca yathārthaṃ pramāṇamiti sāsnādimāngauriti vākyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyamabhyupagacchāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1257: ayaṃ gaurityādyupadeśādinaikasyāṃ vyaktau gośabdārthatayāvagatāyāṃ kimiyameva vyaktiḥ (evam)
GSP33nysu__2u:1258: utānyāpīti jijñāsamānaṃ pratyanyatrāpi gośabdārthatāṃ vijijñāpayipuruṣadeśāderānantyādinā kartumaśakyatavādidaṃ vyāptiviṣayaṃ vākyamāha“yaḥ sāsnādimānsa gośabdārthaḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1265_0: yadvā yaḥ pṛthivīti padaṃ vā vyaktiviśeṣasya tadathartāṃ vāvagacchaṃstatpravṛttinimittaṃ
GSP33nysu__2u:1265_1: jijñāsate taṃ prati pṛthivītvavatī prathivīti pṛthivītvaṃ pṛthivīśabdapravṛttinimittamucyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1266: tatra yasya vaktaryāptatābuddhiḥ sa tāvatā santuṣyati /
GSP33nysu__2u:1268_0: athavāsti gaurnāmārtha iti viditavato yatra tatra gavi ghaṭādāvaśvādau ca gobuddhau
GSP33nysu__2u:1269: idamapi pūvarvadāptatvāvadhāraṇānavadhāraṇābhyāṃ dvayāṃ gatimavalambata iti kimatrānupapannam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1274: tatra kiṃ gaurvyavahārasya viśeṣaṇaṃ gośabdo vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:1275: ādye yadyasau goviśiṣṭaṃ vyavahāraṃ nājñāsīt tadā kathaṃ purovartivyaktau tasya kartavyatāmanumānādapi jānīyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1283: naivaṃ gośabda ityasti viśeṣa iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1288: atha satyapi gotve tadanyatra tadaprayogānneti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1289: evaṃ tarhi yatra sāsnādimattvaṃ nāsti tatra gośabdaprayogo 'pi nāsti,
GSP33nysu__2u:1290: yatra sāsnādimattvamasti tatra sarvatrāstīti yo jānīte taṃ prati lakṣaṇābhidhānamiti syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1296: upadeśādinā viśeṣaṇena gavā viśeṣitaṃ vyavahāramavagatavo hi tadanyatra tatkartavyatānumānasādhyetyaṅgīkāre ko virodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1297: śabdaviśeṣitavyavahārakartavyatāsādhane 'tiprasaṅgaḥ kiṃ bodhyasya bodhakasya veti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1304: nahi bodhyo bādhaparicayaśūnya ityetāvatā paricitabādhenāpi bodhakena viparītaṃ bodhanīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1311: na hyevamasmābhiḥ pratijñātaṃ yatsarvathā śāstrāntarasādhyaṃ tannocyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1314: yadi ca śāstrāntarasādhyo 'pyartho bhavadīyaśāstrasya viṣayaḥ tarhi vyākaraṇādisādhyamanyadapi kasmānnocyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:1316: sandigdhatādisadbhāve 'pi yadavacanaṃ taduktadiśā śiṣyaireva śakyajñānatvāditi yatkiñcidetat /
GSP33nysu__2u:1318: tenāpi hi smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāso 'dhyāsa ityādīni lakṣaṇāni svaśāstre nibaddhāni /
GSP33nysu__2u:1320: tatraite doṣāstāni lakṣaṇāni kiṃ samāskandantyuta neti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1326: āpātato 'pi duṣyānāṃ tathātve kathamunmattabhāṣitānāmapi tadbhāvo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1329: kiñcaivaṃ vadatā prāgbrahmasākṣātkārādbādhyamavyāvahārikaṃ brahmasākṣātkārabādhyaṃ vyāvahārikamiti matamapi parityaktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1332: kiñcaivamasmadīyamapi lakṣaṇaṃ kuto na vyavahāraṃ nirvahet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1356: tadeva mānatvaṃ mānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ mālakṣaṇamiti yāvat yadyapi sāsnādimāngauritivadyathārthaṃ pramāṇamityukte 'pi bhavatyeva lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvapratītiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1358: tataśca pṛthaṅnirūpyamapi syāttanmā śaṅkīti yāthārthyameva mānatvaṃ na tu sāsnādimattvādgotvamiva tato 'tiriktamityuktam / *5,174*
GSP33nysu__2u:1383: ata eva kaṇādaḥ kriyāvadguṇavatsamavāyikāraṇamiti kriyāvattvamapi dravyalakṣaṇatvenāha /
GSP33nysu__2u:1391: nanu (ca) atra pṛthivyādīni navāpi pakṣīkṛtyaitāni dravyāṇi kriyāvattvāditi prayoktavyam,
GSP33nysu__2u:1399: yeṣāṃ ca sa doṣasteṣāmapyupadeśādinā ghaṭāderdravyatvaniścaye sati taditaramūrtapakṣīkāreṇa dravyatvasādhane kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syādityalam / *5,182*
GSP33nysu__2u:1415: kinnāma kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kriyāśrayayordhāraṇakriyāṃ prati ya ādhārastatkārakam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1417: yadi tarhi vijñānaṃ tatkāraṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ dvayamapi /
GSP33nysu__2u:1420: ādye vijñānaṃ kevalapramāṇaṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamalakṣaṇaṃ tatkāraṇamanupramāṇamiti siddhāntavirodhāpātaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1437: tatra sādṛśyārthasya yathāśabdasya tāvadatra na parigrahaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1441: ata eva yathārthānubhavaḥ prametyatra kiṃ yāthārthyamarthasādṛśyamityādiḥ kasyacitpraśco 'nupapannaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1448: tathā cārthaṃ viṣayaṃ nātivartate na vyabhicarati yattatpramāṇamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1482: nahi tadviṣayo grāmādiḥ sarvathā na jñeya iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33nysu__2u:1485: yathā hi pitari sādhurmātari sādhuritivākyaṃ yatkiñcitpitrādau sādhutvena na paryavasyati,
GSP33nysu__2u:1491: sati caivaṃ śabdamahimānamanādṛtya pratyavatiṣṭhamānaḥ chalavāditayā jīyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:1492: tathā prakṛte 'pi jñeyaśabdasya sambandhiśabdatvātsvajñeyaṃ nātivartate yat tatpramāṇamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1494: nopādhinā gamanena vā nimittena grāmo jñeyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1495: yena tamanatikramya vartamānaṃ gamanaṃ yathārthaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1499: tadidamuktaṃ kriyārtheṣu sā na matā śabdārthatattvaviduṣāmiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1508: ādye 'pi vyāptiḥ kiṃ deśataḥ kiṃvā kālataḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1519: pareṇāṅgīkṛtamupādāyāsmābhirvyavahriyate na tu kimapi lakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:1521: nahi svaprakāśaṃ tattvamityetāvatā vinā vedāntādhigamaṃ tadadhigamaḥ śakyo 'ṅgīkartum /
GSP33nysu__2u:1522: athāveditasya sattvaṃ tattvāvedakatvamiti nirbrūyāttadā vibhrame 'tivyāptiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1524: atha yāvadāveditasya sattvaṃ tattvāvedakatvaṃ sadekagocaratvamiti yāvaditi vadet,
GSP33nysu__2u:1528: na hīdamaṃśo vā rajatatvādijātirvā tatsambandhaḥ samavāyo vā tattādātmyaṃ vā na sat /

GSP33nysu__2u:2574: yo 'gnimānna bhavati sa dhūmavānna bhavatīti vyatirekavyāptiḥ kiṃ dhūmenāgnisādhane upayujyate kiṃvāgnyabhāvena dhūmābhāvasādhane /
GSP33nysu__2u:2581: yadabhāvayorvyāpyavyāpakabhāvastayoreva sādhyasādhanabhāva ityabhyupagame nātiprasaṅga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2583: yadabhāvayorvyāpyavyāpakabhāvastayoreva sādhyasādhanabhāva ityabhyupagame nātiprasaṅga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2585: yadabhāvo yadabhāvasya vyāpakaḥ sa tasya vyāpya iti niyamādadoṣa iti cet(na) /
GSP33nysu__2u:2590: kinnāma sāpyanvayarūpaiveti na sarvathā vyāptidvaividhyaṃ sambhavatīti / *5,377*
GSP33nysu__2u:2603: vyāptimātramevānumānāṅgaṃ na punaḥ sapakṣe tadupadarśanamapītyato vyatirekayorvyāptyā tadupapādanaṃ kriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2605: jīvaccharīraṃ sātmakaṃ prāṇādimattvāt yatprāṇādimattatsātmakaṃ prāṇādimaccedaṃ tasmātsātmakamiti prayukte dhūmasyāgninevāsya na vyāptirdṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2610: tadetāvati vaktavye yadanyathā prayujyate tadvivekināṃ sphuṭapratītikatayā saṅgraharucitayā veti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2613: vyāpyaṃ cedanumānaṃ tadā dhūmaḥ śabdānityatve 'pyanumānaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2617: tathāca yo yena vyāpyaḥ sa tasminnanumānamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2642: caturthāstu parasparaṃ vyāpyavyāpakabhāvādanyonyamanumānatāmarhantaḥ prasiddhayaprasiddhibhyāṃ viśiṣṭanta iti saṅkṣepaḥ / *5,382*
GSP33nysu__2u:2644: nanvevamapi dhūmenāgnijñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ syādityata uktaṃ smṛteti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2661: sya yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāptismaraṇasyānantaramayaṃ cāgnivyāptadhūmavāniti pratisandhānātmakaṃ yaddhūmajñānaṃ tattṛtīyamanumānamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2667: tato vyāptismṛtau satyāṃ kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ tṛtīyaṃ jñānameṣyavyamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2671: naca tatsaṅkalitatvaṃ vinā tṛtīyajñānāditi kathaṃ tannaiṣyavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2679: yadā tu gṛhītavyāptervināpi liṅgadarśanādvacanādinaiva vyāptismṛtirāvirasti yadā dvitīyameva liṅgadarśanaṃ pratisandhānātmakamudeṣyatīti nāvaśyambhāvinīyaṃ prakriyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:2680: yathā khalu saṃskārasāhitye satīndriyasannikarṣādeva so 'yamiti pratyabhijñā jāyate tathe(thātrāpī)
GSP33nysu__2u:2698: nanu yo dhūmavānso 'gnimāniti vyāptyuktiḥ kathaṃ pratyāyanāṅgam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2705: prathamata eva vyāptyukterasaṅgatatvādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharan“uktā vyāptireva sā';
GSP33nysu__2u:2715: yo hi parvatamagnimantaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ pareṇa niragnikaṃ manyamānena kiṃ parvatasyāgnimatve mānamityanuyujyate,
GSP33nysu__2u:2716: sa yadi yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāptimātraṃ (paraṃ prati)
GSP33nysu__2u:2733: vyadhikaraṇo 'pi hi kṛttikāgata evodayo rohiṇyudayāsattiṃ gamayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2735: tatastāvadanena vaktavyaṃ yāvatā vyāptivivakṣitasthaladharmatopetatayā liṅgasyānusandhānaṃ syāt tadapyākāṅkṣākrameṇābhidhātavyamiti sthite,
GSP33nysu__2u:2736: nirāśrayasya pramāṇasyābhidhātumaśakyatvāt pramāṇajijñāsotthāpanāya viṣayopakṣeparūpaṃ parvato 'gnimāniti pratijñāvākyaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2742: tadevametāvati vaktavye kathaṃ vyāptimātramuktvā kṛtī syāditi / *5,390*
GSP33nysu__2u:2747: tathāpyākāṅkṣitatvālliṅgasvarūpasya tatpakṣadharmatāyāśca pratipādanāya hetūpanayau vaktavyāviti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2750: kiṃ yena dhūmavattvaṃ parvatavṛttitayāvagataṃ taṃ prati hetūpanayau vaktavyau,
GSP33nysu__2u:2758: taccedvijñānaṃ parasya svatassiddhaṃ tadā kiṃ hetūpanayābhyāmiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2760: yadi liṅgamasiddhaṃ syāt kuta evāsya mānatā // MAnuv_2,1.32cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:2770: viparatītasya tu vyāpyatvāsiddhayā tatpramāṇameva na bhavati (iti)
GSP33nysu__2u:2787: tathāca viditaliṅgasvarūpapakṣadharmatvaṃ prati tatsmārakatvena liṅgatayānusandhāyakatvenetaraṃ prati tajjijñāsājanakatvena hetūpanayayoḥ sārthakyamevetyāśaṅkayāha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2788: yadi smārakamātraṃ syāt smarturnātra prayojanam // MAnuv_2,1.33ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:2802: petasya liṅgasya smaraṇānusandhānajijñāsājanakaṃ syāditi yadyucyate tanna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2803: yato vyāptivacanenaiva tatsmaraṇādimatastasya hetvādinā prayojanaṃ nāstīti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:2805: yadi hi hetvādikaṃ vākyatayā pratyāyakaṃ syāttadā samārthyacintopayujyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2806: yadā tu tatsmārakatvādinaivopayuktaṃ tadā saṃskārodbodhopayuktaṃ sādṛśyasambandhādikaṃ kimapyanve(pye)ṣyavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2808: yo dhūmavānasāvagnimānityabhihite khalvanumānamudrāvit atra dhūmavattvaṃ vyāpyamityavabudhyata eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:2823: parepadeśaṃ vākyaṃ yadi smaraṇādimātrakāraṇamaṅgīkriyate tadātra vyāptivacane satyeva smarturvyāptivacanādeva smaraṇādyutpatteriti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:2824: atra vyāptivacanātirikte śabde prayojanaṃ nāstīti nāsāvavaśyaṃ vaktavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2827: tatra vakturāptatvāvadhāraṇādanusaraṇaṃ prativādini tu tannāstīti cenmā bhūt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2834: kiṃ prakaraṇādyāpannatayāyaṃ na vadatyutāpratipannatvādineti sandehasya prakṛte 'pi tulyatvāditi / *5,402*
GSP33nysu__2u:2842: tathāca pratijñāvākyena viṣayamupakṣipya tatra hetunā pramāṇasvarūpamupadarśya tasyodāharaṇavākyena viruddhānadhyavasitānaikāntikatvanirāsaḥ kriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2846: agnimāneva na tu niragnika iti bādhapratipakṣapratikṣepaḥ kriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2863: dṛṣṭāntādiṣu caivaṃ syāt sādhanaṃ punareva hi // MAnuv_2,1.34ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:2886: tathāpyavāntarākāṅkṣānivartakatvena pañcāvayavamevāvāntaravākyaṃ parisamāpyata ityata āha- liṅgeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2891: evaṃ sati kimatra pramāṇamityavāntarākāṅkṣānivṛttihetau dhūmatvamiti liṅgoktau kṛtāyāmapi avāntaravākyaparyavasānamavaśyaṃ bhavatīti tanmātrameva vākyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2894: yaduktaṃ smaraṇādimātrahetutvena vākyasyopayogastacca vyāptivacanamātreṇa bhavatīti vyāptireva vaktavyeti tadayuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2908: doṣaparijñāna eva tadviyuktā yuktiḥ sujñānetyato yuktidoṣo nirūpaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2931_1: bādhalakṣaṇamayogyatvaṃ virodha iti śiṣyairevohyatāmityāśayavānasaṅgatiṃ nirūpayati- pratijñāyāmiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2941: nanu kathaṃ dve evānumānadūṣaṇe paraparigaṇitānāmasiddhatvādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ sattvādityatasteṣāmatrāntarbhāvaṃ vibhāvayitu virodhavibhāgamāha- virodho 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2945: asaṅgatirapyanekavidheti vā tridhaiva na tvekavidhaiva yenāsiddhayādīnāmantarbhāvo durghaṭaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2956: yatrārthe liṅgapramitiḥ sādhyasiddhayupayoginī tatra tadabhāvo liṅgarāhityam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2961: naca sādhanasya tadbhāve 'pi viruddhasya sādhyatā sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2972: nanvevaṃ sati siddhasādhanatāpi virodha eva syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2979: naca siddhasādhanasya sākāṅkṣatā astīti nāsau virodhe 'ntarbhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2981: nanu cānyatra trividho virodha ityādinā liṅgarāhityāvyāptyorekatāmupādāya sādhyasya sādhanasya vānugamo dṛṣṭāntavirodhastṛtīyatayā parigṛhītaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2992_0: svārthānumāne hi dṛṣṭavyāptikasya liṅgasya vivakṣitasthale siddhimātreṇa sādhyapramitirutpadyata
GSP33nysu__2u:2994: tvavyāptyaupayikasyāpi dṛṣṭāntadoṣasya tadāśrayatayā pratītatvena tathaivodbhavanīyatājñāpanāya tena saha trividhatvamanyatroktamiti na virodhaḥ / *5,420*
GSP33nysu__2u:3004: sādhyādyavyāptistu dṛṣṭāntasya guṇa eva na doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3005: sato hi satā vyāptiṃ pradarśayituṃ dṛṣṭānto 'nveṣyavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3006: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasyāyaṃ doṣa iti cetsa eva kimarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3009: pāramparyeṇopayogo tu sādharmyadṛṣṭānta evāsāviti kiṃ pṛthagupādānena /
GSP33nysu__2u:3013: nahi sarvatra dṛṣṭānta eva vyāptirupadarśanīyetyasti niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3042: pramāṇatadābhāsāviveka eva hi pramāṇaśabdaprayogo na tvaprāmāṇyaniścaye /
GSP33nysu__2u:3043: ahīnabalatayā vā viśeṣaṇe sambhavati tadavāntarabhedopādānaṃ niratharkameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3045: liṅgarāhityagrahaṇena cādūṣaṇānāmapi dūṣaṇatayā paraparigaṇitānāmāśrayavyadhikaraṇasādhyānyathāsiddhīnāṃ nirāso labhyate anyathāsiddherdūṣaṇatve 'pi prakārāntasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3048: anadhyavasitatvādibhedo 'pi kiṃ vyāptyabhāve sambhavatītyetāvatā parisaṅkhayeyo vyavahāropayogitvādvā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3053: nedaṃ sādhakamanaikāntikatvādityasya hi sapakṣavṛttitve sati vipakṣavṛttitvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3059: śiṣyamativaiśadyāya vyutpādanaṃ tvanumatameveti na svīyavyavahāravirodha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3075: tatkiṃ kṛtakatvaṃ kṛśānuśaityaṃ vā śabdanityatvaṃ vā sādhayituṃ svayameva pravṛttam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3083: yathā niśātam kṛśānuśaityādau vyāpārayanpuruṣa evāparādhī syāt natu kṛtakatvādikamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3087: tataḥ kṛśānuśaityādeḥ sādhyatānarhatvaṃ nityatvādisādhane kṛtakatvāderasamarthatvamityādirarthaśabdagata eva doṣo 'ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3088: na hyupādhimantarbhāvya bhavan doṣo na doṣo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:3099: tena sādhanasya hiṃsātvādervailomyaṃ sādhyāpekṣayā vaiparītyamavyāptatvamiti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:3103: sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpako hi dharma upādhiḥ,
GSP33nysu__2u:3113: vyāptijñānādhīnamupādhijñānaṃ tadadhīnaṃ ca nirupādhikatvajñānaṃ tadāyattaṃ vyāptijñānamiti cakrakaprasaṅgena tasya vyāptilakṣaṇatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3120: vastutastu yo dharmo yadvayāpakāvyāptastasya tenāvyāptirityeva vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3122: sādhanasya sādhyavyāpakaparityāgo hi pakṣādanyatra vā syātpakṣe vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3125: dvitīye tu sādhyavyāpakasya pakṣādvayāvṛttiḥ sādhyamapi vyāvartayatīti satpratipakṣataiva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3127: nahi yadabhāvo yatra dūṣaṇaṃ so 'pi tatra dūṣaṇamiti yukta virodhāditi parāstam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3129: etadarthaṃ ca sādhyavyāpakasya vailomyaṃ pakṣādvayāvṛttiḥ sādhanasya satpratipakṣateti yojanīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3132: nanu ca prāganumānādapi satpratipakṣatānumānottaramavyāptirvā kinna syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3135: naca vyāptigrahaṇasamaye pakṣādipravibhāgo 'stīti kathaṃ tadā pratipakṣatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3138: tathāca sādhyarahite tatra vartamānaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyaṃ vyabhicaratīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:3143: tarhi vyāpakavyāvṛttyā pratipakṣeṇaivānumāne dūṣite kiṃ tadupajīvinā vyabhicāreṇeti tulyam / *5,437*
GSP33nysu__2u:3145: kiñca pakṣe vyabhicāraḥ kiṃ niścita uta sandigdhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3154: upādheḥ sādhyavyāpakatvaniścaye tadvayāvṛttyā sādhyavyāvṛttiniścayaḥ sati ca tasminnasāviti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3156: kathaṃ tadvayāvṛttyā pakṣe sādhanasya niścito vyabhicāraḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3157: pakṣe sandigdho vyabhicārastu svata eva siddho sopādhimukhanirīkṣaṇāpekṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3163: anukūlatarkādinā sādhyavyāpakatvaniścaye sati pakṣe niścitavyabhicāritāsiddhiriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:3165: tathāpi sopādhikatvaṃ satpratipakṣatvamiti gataḥ pakṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:3168: nirdhārite tu sāmarthye bādhako vā syāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:3171: atra sopādhikatvamiti vaktavye sādhyavyāpakavailomyamiti vacanamupādhilakṣaṇasyāpi pradarśanārtham /
GSP33nysu__2u:3191: tadidamiṣyamapi tyajati aniṣyamapi gṛhṇātīti na viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3197: upādheḥ syāttadā tasya samavyāptiryadā bhavet'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3200: kiṃ viṣamavyāptikasya vyāpyatvābhāvāttatsambandhena sādhanābhimate vyāpyatābhramānupapatteradoṣatvena tadvayavacchedāya samapadamiti,
GSP33nysu__2u:3212: nanu ca viṣamavyāptikasya pratipakṣonnāyakatvaṃ na sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:3227: asammatau tu tatra doṣāntarameva bhaviṣyatīti kimanupapannam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3228: nanu śaṅkitopādhau kathaṃ pratipakṣaḥ sandigdhāsiddhiprasaṅgenāsamabalatvāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:3233: sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ kimupādhisāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kiṃvā viśeṣalakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3237: naca sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakasya yatkiñcidavacchinnasādhyavyāpakasya ca nopādhitvamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3251: yathā samavāyaḥ sambandhatve sati samavetatvena hīno 'kāryatvādākāśavat /
GSP33nysu__2u:3255: śabdo na sparśavadviśeṣaguṇaḥ pratyakṣatve satyakāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvādityādāviva vyabhicāraparihārārthatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3257: yathā vāyuḥ spārśano na bhavati dravyatve satyacākṣuṣatvāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:3260: yo yatsādhyavyāpako yatsādhanāvyāpaka iti vāsyārtha iti sarvaṃ sustham / *5,467*
GSP33nysu__2u:3267: evaṃ tarhi durbalena virodho 'pi pratijñārthaviruddhatā syāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:3272: prakaraṇādivaśāddhi sāmānyaśabdā api viśeṣe vatarnta iti prasiddham /
GSP33nysu__2u:3273: yathā viśiṣṭasamaye puruṣamānayetyukte puruṣaviśeṣa evānīyate na tu yaḥ ko 'pi puruṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3290: svavākyena virodhe 'pi naiva sādhakatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_2,1.38ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3294: kintu svavākyena virodhe 'pi pramāṇaṃ naiva sādhakatāṃ vrajet /
GSP33nysu__2u:3319: kinnāma tadanapekṣasya pratyakṣāderapi tathā cānyatropalabdhasāmarthyasyānumāne 'pi svātantryasiddhirityāśayavatā prastāvādanumānamiti vaktavye pramāṇamityevādhikṛtam / *5,475*
GSP33nysu__2u:3324: pramāṇavirodhe hi heturapakṣadharmo vā syāt anaikāntiko vā (syāt) /
GSP33nysu__2u:3330: yadi hi pakṣaṃ vihāya bahirevāvinābhāvo 'vagamyate tadā bahirvyāptibalena pakṣadharmo 'pi heturna pakṣe sādhyaṃ sādhayet /
GSP33nysu__2u:3331: asiddhā hi tatra tasya sādhyena vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3339: api ca kiṃ vyāptigrahaṇasamaye 'vyāpterupasthāpakaḥ pramāṇavirodhaḥ syāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:3355: saṃvādānuktisaṃyuktā eta eva ca nigrahāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.38cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:3359: nanu ca pratijñāhānyādīnāṃ vaktṛdoṣāṇāṃ kathamarthavacanadoṣeṣu virodhāsaṅgatinyūnādhikyeṣvanupraveśa ityata uktam- saṃvādānuktisaṃyuktāṃ iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3367: tatrānumānasyaiva yadasādhāraṇaṃ virodhādi tatrānumānadoṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ praveśo 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3371: nanu keyaṃ kathā nāmetyapekṣāyāṃ tatsvarūpaṃ nirūpayansāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgamuddeśaṃ cāha- vāda iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3372: vādo jalpo vitaṇḍeti kathāstisro vijānatām // MAnuv_2,1.39ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3380: tāśca kathā vādādibhedena tisraḥ trividhā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3391: tuśabdena tattvanirṇayasādhanādapi jalpaviśeṣāt taduddeśena pravṛttatvavailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayita /
GSP33nysu__2u:3392: yadā tu viditatattvau vītarāgāvaviditatattvaiḥ parairabhyarthitau kathāṃ kurutastadā tatrāvyāptemetallakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3394: anyatrānantarbhāvena tisra ityasya vyāghātādityata uktam- svārthaṃ parārthamapi veti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3417: sadbhiḥ svasiddhāntamaprakāśyāsādhayitvāsatāṃ pakṣasya dūṣaṇameva kriyate yatsā vitaṇḍetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3418: prativādinaḥ svapakṣasādhanena vinā parapakṣapratikṣepamātreṇa paryavasyantī kathā vitaṇḍetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:3422: tattvajñānāyogyānasataḥ prati sadbhiḥ svasiddhāntasādhane teṣāṃ tattvajñānotpādaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3428: naca svapakṣasādhanahīnāyāṃ vitaṇḍāyāṃ tatsambhavatītyata āha- ukta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3429: ukte taiḥ prathamaṃ māne vaktavyaṃ tasya dūṣaṇam // MAnuv_2,1.41cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:3431: tairasadbhiḥ prathamaṃ svapakṣasādhanāya māne ukte sati sadbhistasya mānasya dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3432: asato vādibhūtasya svapakṣasādhanaṃ parapakṣanirākaraṇaṃ ca karaṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3435: tata etāmeva saṅgatimāśritya ṭīkākṛtā tatraiva vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3444: anyathātyantāpakṛṣṭo 'pyutkṛṣṭatamena vaiyātyāt ghaṭamāno yadi vā daivāyattamabhibhāvayet tadā vṛthākhyātiṃ labheta /
GSP33nysu__2u:3452: vidyāparīkṣāpūrvaiva vitaṇḍā jalpa eva ca // MAnuv_2,1.42ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3454: vidyāparīkṣā pūrvā kāraṇabhūtā yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3461: nanu jalpavitaṇḍārthinovirdyāsāmyādiniścayāya kartavyā parīkṣā kiṃ kathayā, utānyathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3473: yato vidyayoccatvena nirṇītatvameva jayo nīcatvena nirṇītatvaṃ ca parājaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3481: tattvanirṇītiṃ vinoccanīcatvavijñānaṃ na hītyevokte vinā vādeneti vakṣyamāṇavirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3486: tathāpi taduddeśenāpravṛttestādarthvasya prathamamaniścayānna tadarthaṃ jalpo dātuṃ śakyate / *5,500*
GSP33nysu__2u:3506: tau ca vāda eva sambhavato na jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3514: tena vādenaiva tasya nīcoccabhāvasya siddhau satyāmanyayorjalpavitaṇḍayorvyarthatā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3520: prāk parīkṣāto lokasaṃvādādinānyatarasya pratiyogyapekṣayā bahuvidyatvasiddhau tu vādo 'pi naiva dātavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3527: vādo hi vidyāparīkṣākāraṇamityeṣyavyo na tu vyasanitayā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3528: tatphalaṃ tvanyata eva jātamiti kiṃ parīkṣayā kiṃ tadaṅgena vādeneti / *5,503*
GSP33nysu__2u:3539: yataḥ sabhādipūrvastataḥ spardhināmapi vādo yujyata eveti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3554: vidyāparīkṣārthe vāde jayino 'rthādikamapi sabhāpatinā sampādanīyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3559: naca phalāntaramasti yena punarjalpavitaṇḍārambhaḥ syādityata āha- tattvāprakāśa eveti // *5,506*
GSP33nysu__2u:3573: tathā satyarthādīnāṃ bhedena kathā'nantyaprasaṅgādityata āha- tattveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3574: yadyapi arthādayo 'vāntarabhedabhinnāstathāpi tattvāprakāśa eka eva vitaṇḍājalpayoḥ phalam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3580: vinā vādena vidyāyā yadi śakyaṃ parīkṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3585: tadā samavidyayoḥ prathamamapi jalpādiḥ kathāviśeṣaḥ kāryaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3586: tarhi vidyāparīkṣaṇaṃ vādenaivetyuktivirodha ityata āha- vā eveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3589: vāda eva prathamaṃ kartavyo bhavediti yaduktaṃ tadanyathā vādena vinā vidyāparīkṣaṇasya kartumaśakyatva evāto na virodha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3598: athavā samāhārarūpaṃ kathāntaraṃ yadvā nimittadvayasamāveśe vādaśabdasyaiva vyavahārānupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3600: jalpa ityapi nāma syād vādasyaitādṛśasya tu // MAnuv_2,1.48ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3603: etādṛśasya nimittadvayopetasyātra jalpa iti nāma syādityabhyupagamenādyo nirastaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3609: vādasya jalpa ityapi nāma syāditi vādasaṃjñā tu mukhyā jalpasaṃjñā tvamukhyeti sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3613: yadyapi kathakāvādito vijigīṣū tathāpi sabhyādibhivirjigīṣāṃ paribhāvyotpāditā tattvanirṇayārthitaiva kathopayoginī /
GSP33nysu__2u:3614: arthādilābhaścāntarā prāpto na tvādita evoddiṣya ityamukhya eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3615: ata eva pūrva ubhayārthaḥ syādityukte sāmyapratītiprasaktau nirṇītijayakāraka iti tattvanirṇīteḥ prādhānyapradarśanārthaṃ vivaraṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3623: sa ca vādasambandhyevāsyāṃ kathāyāmastītyato vādatvameva mukhyamityāśayavānāha- pratijñeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3627: vidyāparīkṣārthāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kvāpi prameye pratijñāmātreṇa pramāṇopanyāsarahitena vacanena sādhyatvaṃ prajñāpanīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3638: evambhāvo hi vādiprativādinoḥ saṃvāde 'nyonyāptatā'śvāse satyeva syāt tadāśvāso hi vāda eva sambhavati na jalpe /
GSP33nysu__2u:3649: na hyekatrāptaḥ sarvatrāpta eveti niyamo 'stīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3650: yājñavalkyenāpi tatra tatra pramāṇopanyāsaḥ kṛta eveti sakalamanākulam / *5,517*
GSP33nysu__2u:3659: evaśabdau tu vaiṣṇavā eva rāgadveṣavihīnā eveti sambaddhayete /
GSP33nysu__2u:3674: evaṃ tarhi tairevālaṃ kiṃ sabhyairityata āha- etaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:3678: kvacitsūkṣme prameye eteṣāṃ prāśnikānāṃ kāraṇāntaradvājñāne sati vādinorguṇadoṣanirṇayāya sabhyāśca pramāṇaṃ syuriti vakṣyamāṇenānvayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3687: eṣāṃ sabhyānāṃ cājñāne sati dūragā deśāntarasthāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3699: ubhābhyāṃ sādhanaṃ caiva dūṣaṇaṃ vādajalpayoḥ // MAnuv_2,1.51ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3705: idānīṃ tu vitaṇḍāyā lakṣaṇadvayaṃ vivakṣustāvadupayuktamāha- ubhābhyāmiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3725: īśvarādiprameye mukhyo vedādirāgama eva vaktavyaḥ (tasya svātantryeṇa sādhyasiddhayaṅgatvāt)
GSP33nysu__2u:3746: saugato yadi dvayavayavaprayogaṃ kuryāttadā naiyāyikena nyūnena nigṛhyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:3750: tathāca niyatāvayavādivyatirekeṇa vitaṇḍaiva na syādityata āha- svasiddhānteti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3758: adūṣaṇe tu parapakṣādūṣaṇena kathābhāvaprasaṅgādityata āha- pratyakṣeti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3762: āgame tu vādinā prayukte prativādinā vaidikena tasyānyārthataiva daśarnīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3782: śrutyādīnāṃ vedādīnāṃ śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā cetyuktānāṃ liṅgagrahaṇenaiva gṛhītatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3784: parārthe pramāṇānukūlyasya svārthe tatprātikūlyasya ca nirāso darśanīya ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3791: naca vastutattva eva vādināṃ vipratipatteravaśyaṃ nyūnādyavatārasambhavenāprayogaprāptiriti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3792: (ta)yasya yatra tāttvikatvābhimānastena tatprayogānantaraṃ pareṇa nyūnādāvudbhāvite tathārūpatāyāḥ sādha(nīyatvāt)nāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3797: svasvaniyamasyaiva tātvikatvamupetya tadanatikrameṇaiva prayogāṅgīkāre tu sarvathā kathocchedāpatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3804: niyamād yo 'numāṃ brūyād taṃ brūyād yadi tādṛśī /
GSP33nysu__2u:3809: pañca pratijñāhetūdāhaṇopanayanigamanāni vāvayavā yasyāḥ sā tripañcāvayavā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3817: taṃ prati yaḥ saugato niyamādyugmāvayavinīṃ brūyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3818: sa yadi tādṛśī tryavayavā pañcāvayavā ca nānumeti brūyāditi yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3822: naiyāyikena saugataṃ prati pañcāvayavaprayoge vihite saugato 'dhikamiti nigṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3825: atha naiyāyikenāprāmāṇikatvamasiddhamiti vadatā kathamiti saugate pṛṣṭavati (sati)
GSP33nysu__2u:3832: iti bhāratādivākyamastīti cenna“saukṣmyaṃ saṅkhayākramaścaiva nirṇayaśca prayojanam';
GSP33nysu__2u:3843: na tāvadidamanumānaṃ tvaccetasi parivartamānaṃ paraṃ pratyāyanāṅgam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3876: yasmātprayogeyattāsādhanaṃ vādiprativādibhyāmanyatareṇa vā svamataparityāgenānyamatābhyupagame kṛta evopapadyate nānyathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3881: tadā dvayavayavasya tāttvikatvaṃ svayaṃ manyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3884: evaṃ kathābhāvaprasaṅgabhīruḥ saugato 'pi pañcāvayavena dvayavayavasyāvaśyakatāṃ pratipadyamānastattvaṃ manyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3888: asmādeva saṅkaṭādbibhyadudayano yathāvastu vaktavyamityuktvā yathāsiddhāntaṃ vā vaktavyamiti samayaṃ baddhvā pravṛttāyāṃ kathāyāṃ na nyūnādyavatāra iti pakṣāntaramavādīditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:3901: tatra kiṃ vākyārthamātraṃ sādhyate tadviśeṣo vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3904: dvitīye sa viśeṣaḥ pratīto na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3914: dvitīye tu nedaṃ vākyārthānumānaṃ kintu siddhe 'rthe vākyasya liṅgatānumānameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3935: api ca vedānusāreṇa paṭhyamāneṣu laukikavākyeṣu katham /
GSP33nysu__2u:3945: anubhūtiḥ pramāṇaṃ cet kena smṛtirapodyate // MAnuv_2,1.58ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3950: yadi smṛtirna pramā tadā smṛtiḥ lakṣaṇena vyāvartanīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3971: saṃskārasya kāraṇatve 'pi nāsau sattāmātreṇa smṛtiṃ janayati kinnāmodbuddha eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3976: nacāvacchedakena vinā niyamo jñātuṃ śakyata iti / *5,549*
GSP33nysu__2u:3978: yadvā anubhūtiḥ pramāṇaṃ cettadā smṛtāvavyāptiriti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3981: smṛtiḥ kena nimittenāpodyate pramāṇādbahiḥ kriyate na kenāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3996: pūrvānubhūte kiṃ mānamityukte syāt kimuttaram // MAnuv_2,1.58cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:3998: yadi smṛtirapramāṇaṃ syāttadā pūrvānubhūte kiṃ mānamiti praśno niruttaraḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4010: nanu yadi smṛtiḥ pramā syāttadā tatkāraṇasya saṃskārasyānupramāṇatvaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:4016: hi yasmāttatsmaraṇaṃ mānasaṃ manaḥpratyakṣajaṃ na saṃskārakaraṇakaṃ tato noktadoṣa iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4019: smaraṇasya mānasatvaṃ sākṣātkāratvaṃ ca kuta ityata āha- tacceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4027: nanvindriyāṇāṃ prāpyakāritvaniyamādatītena ca manasaḥ prāpterayogātkathaṃ smṛtermānasapratyakṣajatvamityata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4036: tathāhi śrutiḥ“apaśyamapyaye māyayā viśvakarmaṇyado jagannihitaṃ śubhracakṣuḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4041: evañca yathā yogināmindriyeṇaivātītānāgatātharsākṣātkārastathātītamapi manasā smaryata iti ko doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4042: nanvindriyasyārthaprāptirnāma na saṃyogaḥ samavāyo veti niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4046: evaṃ tarhi manaso 'pi pūrvānubhavajanitasaṃskārasācivyalakṣaṇāstyatītārthena pratyāsattirityāśayavatoktam- pūrvānubhūtaṃ ceti // *5,554*
GSP33nysu__2u:4049: yadi prāptiḥ saṃyogādilakṣaṇā vivakṣitā tadā tadabhāvo 'naikāntikaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4052: kāryadarśanavaśācceyaṃ kalpanāsau nātiprasaṅga iti darśayituṃ ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:4053: etena mānasaṃ cetsmaraṇaṃ syānna saṃskārajaṃ tadānanubhūte 'pyu(vyu)
GSP33nysu__2u:4061: etanmayā pūrvaṃ kṛtamityetanmayā manasā vijñātaṃ smṛtamapīti smaraṇasya mānasatvaṃ sākṣādanubhavātsākṣyanubhavena siddhamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4062: yaduktaṃ paraiḥ pūrvānubhavāvacchinnārthagocarā smṛtistadyāthārthyādikamanuvidadhānā na svayaṃ yathārtheti,
GSP33nysu__2u:4065: nanu manaso 'pratyakṣatvātkathaṃ smaraṇasya mānasatā sākṣipratyakṣagamyeti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:4067: tathāpi kāryakāraṇabhāvo na pratyakṣa iti cedanvayavyatirekasacivasya sākṣiṇastatra prāmāṇyābhyupagamāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4080: yasmānmānatrayamevaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ tasmādbrahmādivastuṣu veda eva pramāṇaṃ na yuktyādestatrāvakāśaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4091: ya(ta)smādvedaviṣaye na yukteravakāśastato virodho 'pi sa evokta ityupapannam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4115: dṛṣṭavyāptiviruddhatvāt tatra mānaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,1.62 //
GSP33nysu__2u:4122: dṛṣṭā pramitā vyāptiryasyā yukteḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4152: nityatvena vedaprāmāṇyasya sthitau tu viśeṣaṇāsiddhiniścaya eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:4153: phalavyabhicāramātrasya hetutve tu anaikāntikatvamityevaṃ vyāptipakṣadharmatāvirahavyutpādanena yuktivirodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4165: tato 'nukūlatarkasanāthenopādhivyabhicārānupalambhasahakṛtena sahabhāgagrāhakeṇa pramāṇena siddhā mṛttvādīnāmavaktṛtvādinā vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4172: nanu ca nityatayā vedasya prāmāṇye vyavasthite tadviruddhāyā yukterevāprāmāṇyamucitamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4186: tadevaṃ mṛdabravīdityādivedavākyānāṃ yuktiviruddhatvenāprāmāṇye vedatvāt“yato vā imāni (bhūtāni)
GSP33nysu__2u:4192: vedasya yukteśca niravakāśatvaṃ tata iti parāmṛśati /
GSP33nysu__2u:4195: asyāṃ śrutau vaktṛtvādinā pratipādyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4218: keṣāñciccetanānāṃ mṛdādyabhimānitvaṃ tatastacchabdānāṃ teṣu vṛvirvyāpakatvaṃ sadehatvamantardhānaśaktistatparatā ca śruterityanekasya kalpyamānatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4233: tathāca kathaṃ vedaprāmāṇye 'pi na dīyate dṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4254: tāni tāni mṛdādīni nāmāni vācakāni yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4262: yaccoktaṃ vacanavṛttyaṅgīkāraḥ prakṛtānupayogīti tatparihārāyoktaṃ tattanmṛdādivastvabhimānina iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4264: mṛdādiśabdānāṃ cetanaviṣayatāmātreṇa prakṛtavirodhaśāntāvapi vastusthitiṃ vijijñāpayiṣatā sūtrakāreṇa vyapadeśastviti tuśabdena mukhyavṛttiḥ sūcitā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4271: nanvatra tannāmaka ityekavacanaṃ prakramya tattannāmāna iti bahuvacanaprayoge kinnimittam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4284: vyāptānāṃ sadehatve 'nupalambhabādha ityetatparihārāya viśeṣānugatibhyāmiti sūtrakhaṇḍaṃ kaścidanya iti tātparyato vyākhyātam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4296: tathāpyalpāctarasya pūrvanipātamanusṛtya pravṛttaṃ sūtramanugacchatā kramo bhagnaḥ / *6,24*
GSP33nysu__2u:4298: nanu ca pṛthivyādyabhimāninya iti vākyaṃ kathamupādeyam 'ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca hi',
GSP33nysu__2u:4315: ye tu mīmāṃsakaṃmanyā vigrahavatī devatāṃ na sahante te 'pyanenaiva nirastā bhavanti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4318: anupalambhaḥ anekatra yugapatsannidhānaṃ ca śaktiviśeṣādupapadyate piśācādivat /
GSP33nysu__2u:4323: ityuktvā tatrāpi vipratipannaṃ prati“api lokaḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4326: naca cetano muktaḥ pralīno vā tadvācyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4359: yadvā śāstroktavastuno 'pi śāstraliṅgato 'dhigatisambhavāttatra śabdasya vyutpattiryujyata iti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4365: yadvā śāstraṃ taistaiḥ praṇītaṃ tatsadbhāve liṅgam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4367: tataśca vacanaliṅgānumite vaktari vṛddhairanyānprati mṛdādiśabdāḥ śakyavyutpādanāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4376: yathā khalu loke yathā mudgastathā mudgaparṇī,
GSP33nysu__2u:4380: tathā yaḥ pāśahastatvādimānso 'bādiśabdārtha iti vyutpādanaṃ suvacana(kara)meva /

GSP33nysu__2u:7612: sarvā'pi hi śrutirīśvarameva svātantryeṇa sakalajagatkāraṇaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktiṃ pratipādayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:7631: uktamārgeṇa śrutireva pramā hi na ityuktarītyā śrutiviruddhabhāṣitvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:7660: prāmāṇyāprāmāṇyayorjñānakāraṇamātrajanyatve sāṅkhayasya vacanenotpannaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ cetyubhayātmakaṃ vā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7663: ādye sadasadvilakṣaṇaṃ viśvaṃ manyamāno māyāvādī yathā svoktaniṣedhī sadvilakṣaṇamityuktyā prāptasyāsattvasya,
GSP33nysu__2u:7665: asadvilakṣaṇamityuktyā ca prāptasya sattvasya svayameva sadvilakṣaṇamiti niṣedhāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7667: tadvākyajanitajñānasya yāthārthye hi prakṛtirjagatkāraṇamityādiko 'rtho yo labdhaḥ,
GSP33nysu__2u:7685: syādetat yadā jñānakāraṇaṃ guṇopetaṃ tadā tadīyāyāmaprāmāṇyajananaśaktau guṇena pratibaddhāyāṃ pramāṇajñānamevotpadyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:7686: yadā tu doṣopetaṃ tadā doṣeṇa prāmāṇyajananaśaktau pratibaddhāyāṃ apramāṇajñānamevotpadyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:7687: nahi kimapi karaṇaṃ yugapadubhayopetamubhayavikalaṃ vā sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:7703: tarhyāptāpraṇītatvaṃ doṣo 'pi kinna syāditi sa eva prasaṅgaḥ / *7,82*
GSP33nysu__2u:7705: etena sāṅkhayācāryavacanaṃ svata eva pramāṇaṃ kimāptiniścayenetyapi nirastam /
GSP33nysu__2u:7727: so 'yaṃ kāraṇātparamāvyaktātpāramparyeṇa viśvasya kāryasya vibhāgaḥ pratisarge /
GSP33nysu__2u:7728: mṛtpiṇḍaṃ hemapiṇḍaṃ vā ghaṭamukuṭādayo viśanto 'vyaktībhavantīti tatkāraṇarūpamevānabhivyaktaghaṭamukuṭādikāryamapekṣyāvyaktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:7733: prakṛtestu na kvacinniveśa iti sā sarvakāryāṇāmavyaktameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:7735: tasmātkāraṇe kāryasya sata eva vibhāgāvibhāgābhyāmavyaktaṃ kāraṇamastīti / *7,84*
GSP33nysu__2u:7741: astu tarhi mahata eva paramāvyaktatvamityata uktaṃ bhedānāṃ parimāṇāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:7762: ityeva pratiṣiddhasya kena mūlānumā bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.17 //
GSP33nysu__2u:7768: āstāṃ tāvaddūṣaṇāntaram iti pratyanumānenaiva pratiṣiddhasya pradhānasvātantryasya mūlānumā sādhikānumā kena sāmarthyena bhavet pramāṇamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:7775: evaṃ pradhānasya racanāyāḥ svatantrapravṛtteranumānavirodhenānupapatternānumānaṃ tatra pramāṇamiti sūtrākṣarayojanāṃ manasi nidhāya sūtratātparyamuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:7777: svatantravṛttī racanā sā caivācetane kutaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.18ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:7785: nanvacetanatve 'pi pradhānasya svātantryeṇa pravṛttirastu ko virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:7786: tathāca vipakṣe bādhakābhāvādaprayojako 'yaṃ heturityata āha- acetanatvamiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:7796: tasmādevāmāśaṅkamāno na laukiko nāpi parīkṣaka ityunmattavadupekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:7799: tasmādacetanatve 'pi svatantrapravṛttirastu pradhānasyeti śaṅkaiva notpattumarhatīti kimatra bādhakopanyāseneti / *7,93*
GSP33nysu__2u:7805: ityata svavyāghātaṃ tāvadupapādayituṃ svātantryaṃ vyākhyāti- sveccheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:7806: svecchānusāritāmeva svātantryaṃ hi vido viduḥ // MAnuv_2,2.19ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:7810: ata eva hi svātantryābhāvādvṛkṣastiṣṭhatītyādikartṛtvavyavahāro gauṇa iti sarve pratipannāḥ / *7,97*
GSP33nysu__2u:7814: kinnāma caitanyaviraha ityata āha- kuta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:7824: secchaṃ cedaṅgīkṛtaṃ tadā tadacetanaṃ kiṃ cetanamevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:7826: acetanamapi pradhānaṃ svātantryeṇa pravṛttimadastviti vadatācetanamicchāvadastvityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7833: acetanatvaṃ svātantryaṃ ca yadi parasparavyāhataṃ tarhyacetanatvena svatantrapravṛttirāhityasādhane sādhyāviśiṣṭatādoṣaḥ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:7836: kārayitvā anenaiva svātantryāṅgīkāre 'cetanatvānupapattiriti bādhakaṃ coktaṃ bhavati / *7,103*
GSP33nysu__2u:7851: icchābhāve ca svecchānusāritvalakṣaṇaṃ svātantryaṃ dūrotsāritamiti bhāvaḥ / *7,104*
GSP33nysu__2u:7856: ātmā hi nityo nirvikāraścaitanyamātravapurna tasyecchādikartṛtvamāgantukaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:7862: guṇakartṛtve ca tathā karteva bhavatyudāsīnaḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:7865: kathaṃ na sa ghaṭasya syān ... // MAnuv_2,2.21a //
GSP33nysu__2u:7867: yadi evamanubhava eva nāsti kintu vyavahāramātram,
GSP33nysu__2u:7868: atra ca vyavahāre bhedāgraha eva nimittamucyate,
GSP33nysu__2u:7869: tadā sa bhedāgraho ghaṭasya kiṃ (kathaṃ) na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7876: anyathā ghaṭapaṭāvapītaretarabhedaṃ na gṛhṇīta itītaretaradharmasaṃsargavyavahāraḥ syāditi / *7,107*
GSP33nysu__2u:7879: naca ghaṭapaṭau svarūpaṃ gṛhṇītastatkathamatiprasaṅga iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:7883: upapattau vā sa kathaṃ viśiṣṭo bhedāgraho ghaṭasya na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7889: tarhi sarvagatātmasannidhānaṃ ghaṭe 'pyastīti kathaṃ sa na ghaṭasya syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7894: tarhi ghaṭo 'pi puruṣasyopakāraka iti kathaṃ sa na ghaṭasya syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7900: sya vyavahāraścetkathaṃ sa na ghaṭasya syāt / *7,109*
GSP33nysu__2u:7902_0: kiñca yadi bhedāgrahādantaḥkaraṇadharma evecchā'tmani vyavahriyata ityaṅgīkriyate
GSP33nysu__2u:7902_1: tadā ghaṭasyāpyātmanā bhedāgrahātpṛthubudhnodarākāro 'hamiti vyavahāraḥ kathaṃ na
GSP33nysu__2u:7904: yadi bhedāgrahaḥ syāttadā kathaṃ sa bhedāgraho ghaṭasyātmanaśca na syāditi yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:7906: bhedāgrahaḥ kiṃ bhedagrahasya virodhī na veti /
GSP33nysu__2u:7907: neti pakṣe kathaṃ sa ghaṭasyātmanā paṭādinā vā na syādityuttaram / *7,110*
GSP33nysu__2u:7910: sa cāsti ghaṭa iti kutastatra bhedāgrahastatprayukto vyavahāro veti gūḍhābhisandhimajānato dvitīyapakṣamāśaṅkayāha- mana iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:7916: yadi bhedagraho bhedāgrahavirodhīti bhedena gṛhyamāṇe ghaṭe na bhedāgraha ityucyate,
GSP33nysu__2u:7917: tadā me mana iti manaso 'pi bhedena gṛhītatvānnātmanā bhedāgrahaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7941: phalasya ca vṛkṣaśatpatataḥ kramavartinyākāśasaṃyoge kuṭhārādivyāpāre ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:7947: yugapanmāṇavako gacchati paṭhati panthānamīkṣate vahati ca kamaṇḍalum /
GSP33nysu__2u:7958: anyathā vyāsaṅge kramadarśanenānyatrāpi kramānumānaṃ parasya vyarthaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7969: yathā tarhi vibhāgādiśabde kāraṇāntaradarśanāttannirāsārthaṃ vyāptigrahaṇavelāyāṃ prayatyate tathā sukhādinirāsāya prayatanīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:7980: tasya ca tenaivātmano bhinnatayā grahaṇādbhedāgrahāsambhavenecchāmyahamīti na bhedāgrahanibandhano vyavahāra iti / *7,125*
GSP33nysu__2u:7982: nanu ca “kāmaḥsaṅkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtiradhṛtirbhīrhīrityetatsarvaṃ mana eva';
GSP33nysu__2u:7995: idamiti viṣayoparāga indriyapranāḍikayā pariṇatibhedo darparasyeva malasambandhaḥ pāramārthikaḥ,
GSP33nysu__2u:8005: tata eva manaḥ kāma iti śrutirupapadyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:8015: nahi devadatto gomāniti vākyaṃ yajñadattasya gosambandhaṃ bādhituṃ śaknotīti / *7,133*
GSP33nysu__2u:8031: asti tāvadāstikakāmukasya puruṣasya srakcandavanitādau idaṃ me syādityekataḥ kāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:8041: tatra yo 'priyaviṣayaḥ saḥ antaḥkaraṇadharmaḥ yastu priyaviṣayaḥ sa ātmadharma iti / *7,134*
GSP33nysu__2u:8061: anenācetanasya pradhānasya svātantryeṇa jagatkāraṇatvaṃ sādhayatāmanumānamapi svavacanavirodhaḥ pramāṇavirodhaścoktau bhavataḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:8076: yatprāguktaṃ na yogipratyakṣeṇa sāṅkhayācāryavacanena vāyamarthaḥ siddhayatīti tadapi sūtrasūcitameveti jñāpanam /
GSP33nysu__2u:8085: tasya ca svātantryaṃ kārakāntarāprayojyatvameva natu svecchānusāritvam /
GSP33nysu__2u:8110: yathātra sādhyaṃ vyabhicarati tathā pakṣe 'pi vyabhicaratu heturityevamarthaṃ hi vyabhicārodbhāvanam /
GSP33nysu__2u:8126: ata eva pradhānasya paraprayojyatve pramāṇābhāvo 'pi parāsta iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:8152: antarbhāvitakāryatvameva kāraṇasya śaktirityasya siddhau hi tathā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:8157: ityādinā tārkikaparikalpitābhyāṃ vibhāgāvibhāgābhyāṃ paramāṇukāraṇatvamapi syādityāstāṃ prapañcaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:8160: icchāvattvamātmana eva na tu jaḍasyetyatra hi prathamamanubhavaḥ pramāṇīkṛtaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:8161: tatra ca śrutivirodhe codite 'ntaḥkaraṇadharma ātmadharmaśceti kāmasya dvaividhyānna virodha ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:8162: evañcātmana evecchāvattvaṃ na tvacetanasyeti tyaktamevetyāśaṅkāṃ siṃhāvalokananyāyena pariharati- dvaividhye 'pīti // *7,152*
GSP33nysu__2u:8167: kāmāderdvaividhye 'pi sākṣādanubhavārūḍhamātmanaḥ kāmādeḥ svāmitvaṃ tu kutaḥ pramāṇādapodituṃ śakyate na kuto 'pīti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:8172: tatra manovṛttimapi kāmaṃ pratyātmana eva svāmitvaṃ na manasaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:8176: kṣetropādānakānāmapi sasyānāṃ kṛṣīvala eva svāmī na kṣetraṃ tathaiva /
GSP33nysu__2u:8177: naca vācyaṃ manasa eva kāmasvāmitvamahaṃ kāmaya ityanubhavastu bhrāntirvyavahāramātraṃ veti /
GSP33nysu__2u:8185: nanvastu kāmasvāmitvamātmana eva mā bhūcca manasaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:8194: yadi yadevecchāvattvaṃ prāṅmanaso niṣiddhaṃ tadevātra punaraṅgīkriyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:8198: śrutyarthatayā tvicchopādānatvalakṣaṇamicchāvatvamidānīṃ manaso 'bhyupagamyata iti kuto virodha iti / *7,156*
GSP33nysu__2u:8200: yadvā kāmasya dvaividhyena manaso 'pi kāmavattvātkartṛtvamupapatsyata ityata āha- dvaividhye 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:8201: dvayoḥ kāmavattve 'pi kāmasvāmitvamātmana eva na tu manasaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:8207: yo hīcchati sa prayatate na tu yadicchā bhavati taditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:8215: svāmī ca sa ucyate yo yatheṣyaviniyoktā /
GSP33nysu__2u:8221: kimicchā'tmanaḥ sarvathāpi vaśā na bhavati ityucyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:8227: kiñcit tadvaśagatve 'pi svāmitvaṃ lokavad bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.26ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:8229: prabalavirodhivaśādatyantavaśatvābhāve 'pīcchāyāḥ kiñcidātmavaśatvamātreṇāpi tāṃ pratyātmanaḥ svāmitvaṃ bhavede(vatye)va /
GSP33nysu__2u:8231: yathātyantamavaśāyāmapi gavi kiñcidvaśatvamātreṇa devadattasvāmitvaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ tathaiva /
GSP33nysu__2u:8237: acetanasya kartṛtvaṃ nirākartumātmana evecchāsvāmitvaṃ natu manasa iti samarthitam /
GSP33nysu__2u:8238: tarhīśvarasyāpi kulālādimanovṛttīcchāṃ prati svāmitvaṃ nāstīti ghaṭādikartṛtvaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:8242: yadā jīvasyāpi kāmādisvāmyaṃ tadā sarvātmanā tantramadhīnaṃ kāmādi yasyāsau tathoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:8243: sarveṣāmātmanāṃ tantraṃ sādhanaṃ yaḥ kāmastasyādiḥ kāraṇaṃ tasya pareśituḥ kāmasvāmitvaṃ kimutaiva vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:8246: tatreśvaro 'ntaḥkaraṇaṃ spaṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra jñānecchāprayatnarūpā vṛttīḥ svecchājñānaprayatnairutpādya bāhyakaraṇāni cādhiṣṭhāya ghaṭādyutpādayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:8251: tathā coktam“svasvāmibhāvo dhruva eṣa yatra tarhyacyute 'sāviti kṛtyayoge'; iti / *7,161*
GSP33nysu__2u:8255: kāmaḥ saṅkalpa iti manasaḥ kāmasvāmitvābhidhātryāpauruṣeyatvena balavatyā vedavācaivāpoditatvādityata āha- naceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:8261: kāmādyanuvādena khalviyaṃ vedavāk ātmopādānatvaṃ vaiśeṣikādimataprāptaṃ vārayituṃ teṣāṃ manorūpatvamācaṣṭe /
GSP33nysu__2u:8268: upajīvyavirodhe tu na prāmāṇyamamuṣya ca'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:8270: tarhi śruteḥ kā gatirityata āha- tasmāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:8278: mokṣakāmo bhavedanyo yadi muktād bhaviṣyataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.28ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:8282: tathāca yo mukto bhaviṣyati tasmādanya eva mokṣakāma itayuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:8295: paraprayojanārtaṃ pravatarmānāḥ khalu loke dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā kimapi prayojanamanusandadhānāḥ prāyeṇopalabdhāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:8300: yatā kṛpālutvena bhavatāmīśvarasyetyata āha- svanāśārthaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:8306: na hi ko 'pi kṛpālurātmanāśārthaṃ yatamāno dṛṣṭa iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:8317: bhogārthā pravṛttiḥ prakṛteḥ svabhāva iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:8326: yadyātmā na kāmakartā syāttadā mumukṣurapi na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:8333: evamanīśvarasāṅkhayamataṃ sādhāraṇadūṣaṇairapākṛtya ye kartṛtvaṃ prakṛtereva bhoktṛtvaṃ tvātmana iti manyante tanmataṃ dūṣayati- kartṛtvamiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:8337: yena mayedaṃ kṛtaṃ sa evāhaṃ tatphalaṃ bhuñja iti kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyānubhavāttayadvaiyadhikaraṇyāṅgīkāre 'nubhavavirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:8340: vibhāge ca tayormānaṃ naiva kiñcit kvacid bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.29cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:8356: tayā dīkṣito 'yaṃ tu sāṅkhayo māyāvādināmupamātvaṃ prāpnuyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:8357: te 'pi hi kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādisakaladharmavikalamasatkalpaṃ caitanyamātramaṅgīkṛtyāvidyāyā evācetanāyāḥ sarvakāraṇatvaṃ bandhamokṣādhikaraṇatvaṃ cābhyupagacchanti /
GSP33nysu__2u:8367: yāpi sāṅkhayaparikalpitā sṛṣṭipralayabandhamokṣatatsādhanaprakriyā sāpi sarvapramāṇaviruddhetyuktaṃ bhavati / *7,178*
GSP33nysu__2u:8373: tasmānmāyāvādisadṛśatvādeva hi sāṅkhayo bhoktrāpatteravibhāgaścetsyāllokavaditi prāk parākṛtena māyāvādinā racanānupapatteśca nānumānamiti caśabdena samuccitya nirākṛtaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:8386: evaṃ pradhānaṃ svayameva mahadādirūpeṇa pariṇamata ityāśaṅkā kilātra nirasyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:8395: gavādyupabhuktasyaiva kṣīratvaṃ nānyatreti hi vadatā prakṛteḥ sahakārisadbhāvamātramupapāditaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:8402: sāṅkhayamatasya nirastatvātkiṃ punarupanyāsenetyato 'sya matasya tato viśeṣaṃ tuśabdena sūcayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:8406: yadyapi seśvara ityanenaiveśvaro 'stīti brūta iti siddham /
GSP33nysu__2u:8408: ya īśvaro 'sti sa kṣetrānugrahaśaktimāneveti brūta iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:8412: sarvaśaktitvābhāve kiṃ tasyeśvaratvamityata uktam- svayambhāta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:8427: eta eva pañca kleśāstantrāntare tamo moho mahāmohāḥ tāmisro 'ndhatāmisra iti vyavahriyante /
GSP33nysu__2u:8449: yadyupādānatvotpattiśaktimattvaṃ prakṛtipuruṣayoreva tadā kimīśvareṇānugrāhakeṇetyata āha- parjanyavaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:8450: yathā hi pṛthivyāḥ kalamādibījānāṃ copādānatvabījatvaśaktī yadyapi svāyatte /
GSP33nysu__2u:8459: tatkiṃ niṣpramāṇaka eveśvaraḥ prakṛtyanugrāhako 'ṅgīkaraṇīya ityata uktam- smṛta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:8464: prakṛtipuruṣayoḥ svāyattaśaktitvaṃ kuta ityata āha- pṛthivīvaditi // *7,186*

GSP33nysu__2u:11256: tasmāddharmadharmāṇāmāśrayābhede 'vaśyamaṅgīkārye tatra dharmadharmyādivyavahārānyathānupapattyā viśeṣo 'ṅgīkaraṇīya iti yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11269: kiñca dharmagatā dharmā yadi āśrayābhinnāstadā kiṃ dravyādigatāstitvādidharmairaparāddham /
GSP33nysu__2u:11272: tatasteṣāmeva dravyādyabhede sati punarvyavahārānyathānupapattyā dravyādiṣveva viśeṣasiddhiḥ (iti) / *7,560*
GSP33nysu__2u:11280: tato bhinnanimittatayopapadyamāno vyavahāro na viśeṣamākṣeptumalamityata āha- sāmānyasyāpīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11293: sadgotvaṃ caturviṃśatiguṇā rūpādrasaḥ pṛthagiti pratibhāsasya durapahnavatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11294: naca na sadgotvamityādi bādhakamasti yena pratītasyāpi parityāgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11300: yadi gotvādau sattā syāttadā sattāyāmapi syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11307: pramāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ vṛttau na bhinnābhinnateyatā'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11310: tasmātsāmānye sāmānyaṃ guṇe ca guṇaḥ anavasthābhayādeva nāṅgīkriyata ityeva vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11314: tathāca yathā sā dūṣaṇaṃ tathā prakṛtāpi dūṣaṇameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:11315: na cetsāpi na syāditi sāmānyāderapi sāmānyādyaṅgīkāryaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11320: astyeva sāmānyasyāpi sāmānyaṃ guṇasyāpi guṇo nirbādhapratītisiddhatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11324: ... sa ca yadi nānavasthā kvacid bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.102cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:11327: caśabdātsāmānyasyāpi sāmānyaṃ yadyaṅgīkriyate tadā brūmo nānavasthā kvacidbhavediti / *7,566*
GSP33nysu__2u:11359: natvaniṣyāpattiheturityapi vaktuṃ śakyatvena kvacidaṅgīkṛtāpyanavasthā na dūṣaṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:11365: api ca yo dharmadharmiṇorbhedaṃ samavāyaṃ cāṅgīkṛtyābhedaṃ viśeṣaṃ cāvajānāti tenānavasthāto bibhyatā guṇasāmānyayorguṇasāmānyapratītirevāpalapanīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:11368: abhedaṃ viśeṣaṃ cāṅgīkurvatāṃ tu nedaṃ dūṣaṇadvayamato 'pi tatpakṣapāta ityāśayavānāha- asmatpakṣa iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11379: ananyatve kathaṃ tadvṛttamiti tadavasthaḥ pratītivirodha ityata uktam- viśeṣato hi tadvanta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11383: idānīṃ kvacidbhedābhedāvapi bhavata iti tadapavādamāha- bheda iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11387: kathaṃ tarhi satsvevāvayavādiṣu vinaśyantītyata āha- bheda iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11391: yatra satsvevāvayaveṣvavayavino 'bhāvaḥ sati guṇini guṇasyābhāvastatra bhedābhedāvityādi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11392: anyathā yatrāvayavāvayavyādīnāṃ yugapadvināśastatra bhedābhedāvuktau na syātām /
GSP33nysu__2u:11394: satyapi tasminnasattvādityanena hetunāvayavyādīnāmavayavādibhyo bhedamātraṃ vā sādhyate 'tyantabhedo vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:11400: evaṃ satyapi dravye kecidguṇā asanto yathā pākajādayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11413: tathā satyapi tasminnasattvasyāpi viśeṣaṇaiva nirvāhaḥ kriyatām /
GSP33nysu__2u:11421: nacāvacchedakena vinā bhedābhedabhūmeḥ saṅgrahaḥ syādityayāvadāśrayabhāvitvameva grāhyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11422: tatrāpi viśeṣa eva saṅkaraṃ vārayiṣyatīti tu nirastam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11425: nanu anityadravyāśritā ekatvādayo 'pi guṇāḥ kiṃ bhedavantasteṣāmapi dravyakāryatayā taduttarakṣaṇabhāvitvāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:11438: kathaṃ viśeṣāśrayaṇe virodhaśāntirityata āha- virodha iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11442: tato viśeṣaṃ samāśrityaikatra bhedābhedau bhavata ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11446: kvacidāśrayabhedo yathā madhurāyāṃ devadattasadbhāvaḥ srughne tadabhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11448: kvacitpratiyogibhedo yathā gavayo goghaṭābhyāṃ sadṛśo visadṛśaśceti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11452: sarvatra viśeṣamāśritya virodhasyotsādayituṃ śakyatvādityata āha- dṛṣṭīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11464: asti ca bhedagrāhiṇī satyapi tasminnasattvāditi hetujanitā dṛṣṭiriti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11474: tathāpi kathaṃ virodhaśāntirityata āha- virodha iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11477: sahadarśane sati kathaṃ virodho vaktuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11481: tato dṛṣṭe virodhastu sadbhirāpādyate katham // MAnuv_2,2.105 //
GSP33nysu__2u:11487: ataḥ sahadṛṣṭe bhedābhedalakṣaṇe vastudvaye virodhaḥ kathamucyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:11490: hiśabdena śītoṣṇādau rūparasādau ca virodhāvirodhayordarśanaikapramāṇatvaṃ nidarśayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11493_0: vaiśeṣikādayo hi saṃyogavibhāgaśabdātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ tatraiva tadaiva bhāvābhāvāvupetya
GSP33nysu__2u:11493_1: sahadarśanādvirodho nāstīti vadantaḥ punaratra sahadarśane 'pi virodhamudbhāvayantaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:11493_2: svavyāhatabhāṣiṇaḥ svoktavismaraṇaśīlāḥ svadṛṣṭipakṣapātinaḥ kathaṃ santaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11494: sarvatrāsahadṛṣṭayoryadi kaścidāgrahamātreṇa sahāvasthānaṃ manyate taṃ pratyeva virodhodbhāvanaṃ kriyate- nānyatheti // *7,581*
GSP33nysu__2u:11497: tatkiṃ sarveṣvapi dravyeṣūta keṣucidevetyapekṣāyāmāha- abhinna iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11498: abhinno bhagavān svena tadanyena vibhedavān // MAnuv_2,2.106ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:11502: tadanyena prakṛtijīvajaḍātmanā prapañcenetyevaṃ vyavasthitāveva bhedābhedau na tvekaviṣayāvityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11503: ayāvaddravyabhāvidharmairbhedābhedau kuto na syātāmityata āha- nityā iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11517: satyeva dhamirṇi sāmastyenocchedavanto ye dharmāste ubhayarūpiṇo bhinnābhinnā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11519: yadvā sāmastye dravyasyāvikalatve nāśābhāve 'pi ye ucchedina iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11520: kiṃ svasadbhāvavelāyāmabhedino 'sadbhāvavelāyāṃ bhedina ityevaṃ kālabhedena bhedābhedāvityata uktam- bhāva iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11524: kuto bhinnābhinnā ityata āha- ta eveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11525: ... ta eva cocchedāt tadanye ca samastaśaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.107cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:11527: pratyakṣabalena ta eva dharmisvarūpabhūtā eva ucchedāt satyeva dharmiṇyasattvāddhetostadanye /
GSP33nysu__2u:11538: sarvadikṣvapi sambandhāditi yadaṃśataḥ saṃyoga ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11544: ataḥ pūrvapūrvasaṃyogānutpattāvuttarottarānutpattiprasaṅgādaṃśataḥ saṃyoga iti niyamo nopapadyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11546: yadyapyaṃśata eva saṃyogo yadyapi cāṃśeṣvaṃśaparamparāyā aviśramastathāpyaṃśāṃśinorabhede naivāṃśasaṃyoga eva hi yasmādaṃśinaḥ saṃyogo 'to nānavastheti / *7,586*
GSP33nysu__2u:11549: syādiyamanavasthā yadi sarvatrāṃśata eva saṃyoga iti vadatāmasmākamaṃśinaḥ saṃyogoṃ'śasaṃyogenaiva jāyata ityabhiprāyaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11551: kintu yo yasya aṃśinaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa tadaṃśe vartate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11552: niraṃśasya tu saṃyogaḥ kva nāma vartatām /
GSP33nysu__2u:11553: ataḥ paramāṇvoḥ saṃyoge sati tadvṛttyarthamaṃśo 'ṅgīkaraṇīya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11566: atiprasaṅgo hi tadā syādyadi paṭavadghaṭāṃśo 'pi ghaṭādatyantabhinnaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11570: aṃśāvṛttitve sati ghaṭavṛttitvasādhane dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavikalaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11572: yadi ghaṭasaṃyogo ghaṭāṃśe vartate tarhi ghaṭāṃśasaṃyogaḥ kva vartata iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:11573: anena (eva) nyāyena tadaṃśe so 'pi tadaṃśa iti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11577: evaṃ tarhi paramāṇuvṛttirapi saṃyogo ghaṭasaṃyogaḥ syāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:11579: aṃśasaṃyoga eva hyaṃśinaḥ saṃyogo 'to nānavasthetyuktamanavasthāparihāraṃ vivṛṇoti- ekasminniti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11580: ekasmin jāta evānyaḥ saṃyogo jāyate yadi /
GSP33nysu__2u:11581: anavasthā tadaiva syāt saṃyogaikye bhavet kva sā // MAnuv_2,2.109 //
GSP33nysu__2u:11583: avayavaparamparāyā aviśramamabhyupagamyaikaikasminnavayavasaṃyoge jāta evānyo 'vayavasaṃyogo jāyata iti yadyaṅgīkurmastadaivānavasthā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11585: avayavavṛtteḥ saṃyogādaparo 'vayavinaḥ saṃyogo nāstīti vāde tu,
GSP33nysu__2u:11599: kintu hastakarmaṇā janito hastavṛttiḥ saṃyoga eva hastakāyayorabhedātkāyasaṃyogo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11608: dvitantukāvayave tantau karmotpannaṃ tasya tantvantarādvibhāgaṃ karoti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11611: tata idānīṃ tantvorvartamāno vibhāgaḥ sakriyasyāvayavasya dvitantukasaṃyuktākāśādideśādvibhāgaṃ karotīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11614: hastakarmaṇā janito hi vibhāgo hastakāyayorabhedāddhastakāyaguṇo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11615: ata eva vivādādhyāsito vibhāgo na karmāsamavāyikāraṇakaḥ karmaikārthāsamavetatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11620: anyathāṅgulikarmaṇāṅguleraṅgulyantarādeva vibhāgo bhavati ākāśādideśāttu vibhāgādeveti syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11635: ārabdhadravyamantyāvayavisparśarahitaṃ vinaśyadavasthaṃ vinaśyadavasthasaṃyogaṃ niṣphalārambhaṃ vijātīyaṃ ceti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11641: tantukarma na tantvantaravibhāgajanakaṃ karmatvāt sampratipannakarmavadityapi prayogasambhavāt tatra pramāṇabādha iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:11645: ākāśavibhāge vibhāgena kartavye karmaṇo nimittatvābhyupagamātsiddhasādhanamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11648: etena vimataṃ karma dravyārambhakasaṃyogavirodhitadavirodhivibhāgajanakaṃ na bhavati karmatvāditi nirastam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11649: vimataṃ karma dravyārambhakānārambhakasaṃyogārambhakaṃ na bhavati karmatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11651_1: vyāptestantukarmaṇo gaganavibhāgajanakatve tantvantaravibhāgajanakatvaṃ na syāditi cennana /
GSP33nysu__2u:11652_1: vyāpterākāśadeśavibhāgājanakatve tantvantarādapi vibhāgajanakaṃ na syāditi pratiprasaṅgasambhavāt / *7,601*
GSP33nysu__2u:11654: kiñca tantorākāśavibhāgo yadi vibhāgajo na tu karmajastadā sakarmakasyevākarmakasyāpi kuto na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11661: evaṃ chalatvenānavasthāprasaṅgaṃ nirākṛtya prakārāntareṇa nirākaroti- aṃśa iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11666: āpādake 'rthe dṛṣṭe sati sā anavasthitiḥ kā na dūṣaṇamiti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:11668: yadyaṃśataḥ saṃyogaḥ syāttadānavasthā syāttataśca saṃyogābhāva evāpadyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:11670: tasmānnāṃśataḥ saṃyoga iti hi viparyaye paryavasānaṃ kartavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11675: atrāṃśataḥ saṃyoge na bhavatīti ko 'rtho yadyaṃśisaṃyogasyāṃśasaṃyogapūrvakatāniyamo nāstīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11686: kimaṃśabhedena bhāvābhāvau dṛśyete uta ghaṭa eveti sandehāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11691: ta eva santu tarhi saṃyogāvābhāvāśrayāḥ kimaṃ(śi)
GSP33nysu__2u:11696: yadyaṃśago na saṃyogaḥ kāryeṣu prathimā katham // MAnuv_2,2.110cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:11698: yadi kāraṇānāṃ saṃyogastadaṃśavṛttirna syāttadā tadārabdheṣu kāryeṣu kāraṇāpekṣayā parimāṇotkarṣo na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11704: praśithilatā ca saṃyogasya keṣucidaṃśeṣu vṛttiḥ keṣucidavṛttireva /
GSP33nysu__2u:11707: tataḥ saṃyogasyāṃśavṛttitvābhāve pracayo 'sau na bhavatīti kāraṇābhāvādutkṛṣṭaparimāṇotpādo na syāditi / *7,610*
GSP33nysu__2u:11710: prastute paramāṇau saṃyogasyāṃśavṛttitvābhāve nātiprasaṅga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11717: paramāṇuparimāṇādaṇodvaryaṇukasya mahattā parimāṇotkarṣo nāstīti vaco 'dbhutaṃ svavyāhataṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11718: ayamāḍhyo 'yaṃ paramāḍhya itivadaṇuparamāṇuśabdābhyāmeva parimāṇatāratamyāvagatestadabhāvavacanaṃ svavyāhataṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11724: tatkathaṃ paramāṇoḥ pracayābhāve dvayaṇuke parimāṇotkarṣānutpādāpādanamityata āha- aṇūnāmiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11726: paramāṇormahattvaṃ ca vinetyetad vacaḥ katham // MAnuv_2,2.111c-f //
GSP33nysu__2u:11728: dvayaṇukānāṃ parimāṇotkarṣāpekṣāṃ vinaiva saṃkhyāmātreṇa tryaṇuke sa parimāṇotkarṣo jāyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11729: tathā paramāṇormahattvaṃ parimāṇotkarṣaṃ vinā kevalasaṃkhyayā dvayaṇuke parimāṇotkarṣo jāyata ityetadvacaḥ kathaṃ ghaṭate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11732: atra parimāṇamātragrahaṇe kartavye prathimeti mahattvamiti coktirvisadṛśaparimāratvasyānapekṣāhetoḥ nirākaraṇaṃ smārayitumiti / *7,613*
GSP33nysu__2u:11734: aṃśāṃśinoratyantābhedo bhedābhedau ceti yaduktaṃ tadviśadayati- aṃśina iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11737: yathā gaganāderyāvadaṃśabhāvinoṃ'śinaḥ svāṃśairatyantābhedastathā paṭāderaṃśino 'pi sarvairaṃśaiḥ atyantābhedaḥ ekaikāṃśena tu bhidābhidā /
GSP33nysu__2u:11756: tathā vyatiṣaktatantava eva paṭastathāpi na paṭābhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11758: sa ca tebhyo na bhidyate iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11764: kathaṃ caikaikatantunābhedaḥ ekaikatra paṭabuddhayabhāvādityata āha- sarveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11774: kintu vyatiṣaṅge sati yattantūnāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ rūpam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11794: evaṃca guṇānāṃ guṇinaikye saṃyogādyāśrayānekadravyābhedo vā saṃyogādibhedo vā'padyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:11796: tasya vyaktayabhede vyaktīnāmapyabhedaḥ sāmānyasya vā bhedaḥ prasajyetetyataḥ saṃyogavibhāgapṛthaktavānāṃ tāvadanekāśritatvaṃ nāstītyāha- saṃyogaśceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11797: saṃyogaśca vibhāgaśca bhedaścaiva pṛthak pṛthak // MAnuv_2,2.113ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:11807: tathātve caikaikasminneva saṃyuktādipratyayaprasaṅga ityata āha- anyonyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11823: anyonyapratiyogena hetunā saṃyogādikamubhayorapi pṛthak pṛthageva hi dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11825: paṭo ghaṭena saṃyukto ghaṭādvibhakto ghaṭādbhinna iti paṭadharmaḥ saṃyogādigharṭapratiyogikatayā pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11829: evaṃ ghaṭadharmaḥ saṃyogādiḥ paṭapratiyogitayopalabhyamāno na paṭadharmo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11834: yaddhi ghaṭātpaṭaḥ pṛthak paṭācca ghaṭaḥ pṛthagityanyonyapratiyogikatayā pratīyate tadekapṛthaktavaṃ pṛthak pṛthagevābhyupagamyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11835: yattu bhinnāvimau bhinnā ime iti pratīyate tadanekapṛthaktavamanekāśritameva pratiyogyanirūpyasyaikāśrita(śraya)
GSP33nysu__2u:11837: bhinnā iti tu bhedānāṃ samudāyo hi dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11840: ime bhinnā ityādipratītau bhedānāṃ samudāyo 'nekatvaṃ hi dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11844: yathā hi śuklā ime paṭā ityādipratītāvaneke paṭā anekāni ca tadviśeṣaṇāni śauklayānyavabhāsante /
GSP33nysu__2u:11845: tathā bhinnā ima ityādipratītāvapyaneke padārthā aneke ca bhedāḥ prakāśante ityabhyupagantavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11859: asyāmapi pratītāvito ghaṭādamuṣya paṭasyāmutaḥ paṭādamuṣya ghaṭasya bheda ityevaṃ dvidharmiko bhedo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11864: tena anumīyate 'syāṃ pratītāveka eva bhedo dvidharmiko dṛṣṭa iti /

GSP33nysu__2u:11875: paṭasya ca yādṛśena tantusamudāyenātyantābhedo 'bhihitaḥ sa eka eva /

GSP33nysu__2u:12534: aupādhikabhede ko viśeṣo yenāsāvabhedaṃ na viruṇaddhītyarthaḥ / *8,84*

GSP33nysu__2u:12544: yadi ca viśeṣaṇaviṣayau tadā samavāye bhedo 'styeva /

GSP33nysu__2u:12557: nacaivaṃ bhedasyāsttvaprāptyā siddhasādhanatātādavasthyamiti vācyam yato 'vidyamāna evānyaḥ samavāyo 'dhigamyate tattadupādhineti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:12559: tathā taistaiḥ sambandhilakṣaṇopādhibhiravidyamānā evāneke samavāyāḥ pratīyante /

GSP33nysu__2u:12584: evameva tannityatvābhyupagame prāgasataḥ sattāsamavāyo janirduṣyā matā /

GSP33nysu__2u:12596: kṛtau tu prāksiddhasya sādhanamevāśakyamiti kulālādivyāpārasya niṣphalatvaṃ syāt /
