GSP33nysu__2u:14975: na hyevaṃ loke pratītiḥ lokānusāreṇaiva ca paramārtho boddhavyo nānyathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:14979: tataḥ kiṃ siddhamityato yaduktaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā sato 'pi kāraṇatve pramāṇābhāva iti tatparihṛtamiti vadansamīkaraṇāntaramapi pariharati- asmākaṃ tviti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14986: bādhavidhureṇa pramāṇena jagataḥ satyatvasiddhau madhurādīnāṃ puṣyayādikāraṇānāṃ sattvasiddheḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14987: tantvādīnāṃ ca vicitrasvabhāvatayā pramāṇena siddhānāṃ na mṛdādikāryakāritvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14990: pramāṇena sattayā pramitānāṃ madhurādīnāṃ sadbuddhimātravailakṣaṇyakalpanā tyayuktaiva /
GSP33nysu__2u:14992: īśvarasya sarvakāraṇatve 'pi tantvādyapekṣā puruṣaprayatnādyapekṣā deśakālādiniyamaśca yujyata eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:15000: brahmādīnsṛṣṭayādāvīśvarasteṣu kṛpayāpekṣate parameśvaraniyogānuṣṭhāne teṣāṃ paramapuruṣārthalābhāditi jñāpayituṃ prasādādityuktam / *8,289*
GSP33nysu__2u:15003: satyatvasādhanāyopanyastasya pratyakṣasyānyathāsiddhimāśaṅkaya tatparihāratvena vaidharmyācca na svapnādivaditi sūtraṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15011: vimataṃ gaganādikaṃ mithyā dṛśyatvāt svapnavadityanumānena viśvamithyātvasiddheḥ kathaṃ (tatsa)
GSP33nysu__2u:15023: nahi śabde 'vidyamānena cākṣuṣatvena śabdānityatvaṃ siddhayatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15028: dṛśyatvaṃ mithyā na cedatha ca dṛśyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15043: yatra ca sādhakatvaṃ saṃmataṃ tatra mithyātve vipratipattito 'satyasya sādhakatvaṃ sādhyameva,
GSP33nysu__2u:15046: vipratipattau sādhakatvaṃ mithyātvaṃ vā sādhayiṣyāmīti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:15059: nāpi sadvādī kadāpi sattvāsattvodāsīnena pramāṇena sādhyasiddhimaṅgīkuryāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15062: evamasiddhivyabhicārābhyāmanumānaṃ nirākṛtya pramāṇabādhaṃ cāha- sattvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15068: kintu yadanyadapi prapañcamithyātve 'numānaṃ jaḍatvaṃ vā paricchinnatvaṃ vā parairucyate tasyāpītyāha- anubhūtīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15069: anubhūtivirodhena mithyātve mā na kācana // MAnuv_2,2.219ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:15095: kimato yadyevamavartamāno 'pi kālaḥ sākṣigocara ityata āha- taditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:15107: nahi viṣayasya traikālikābādhyatvamanantarbhāvya tatpratīteḥ prāmāṇyaṃ śakyagrahaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15108_1: vyavasthāpayettadā śuktirajatādipratīterapi sa eva grāhaka iti tasyā api prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15109: tathāca tadviṣayasyāpi rajatādestraikālikābādhyatvaṃ siddhayedityato dṛṣṭaśabdaṃ vyākhyāti- dṛḍheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15110: dṛḍhadṛṣṭaṃ tu yad dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭābhāsastato 'param // MAnuv_2,2.220ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:15122: tenāpyaṅgīkṛtaḥ samyak sa naḥ satyatvameva hi // MAnuv_2,2.220d-f //
GSP33nysu__2u:15126: saṃvṛtisatyasya tathātvenābhyupagatasya viśvasya viśeṣo vailakṣaṇyam avyabhicāravān kadācitkvacidapi sampratipannamithyābhāve avartamānaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15130: naḥ asmākaṃ mate viśvasya satyatvaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15132: atra tenāpi samyagaṅgīkṛta ityanena pakṣadharmatā samarthitā /
GSP33nysu__2u:15139: nanu ca śuktirajatādīnāṃ prāk śūnyatattvajñānācchuktyādijñānenaiva nivṛttiḥ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:15140: prapañcasya tu śūnyajñānena kadācinnivṛttirbhaviṣyatītyevaṃ mayā prātītikasāṃvṛtayoḥ vailakṣaṇyamaṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15151: nanvidaṃ kadācidbādhiṣyate dṛśyatvācchuktirajatādivadityanumānasya sattvātkathamatra pramāṇābhāva ityataḥ (tasyo)
GSP33nysu__2u:15153: ... pramā sā ca na bhavet svavirodhataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.221cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:15162: ato 'sya viśeṣasyāprāmāṇikatvenāṅgīkartumaśakyatve yo 'nyo viśeṣaḥ prāmāṇikaḥ pramāṇāvirodhī cāṅgīkartavyaḥ,
GSP33nysu__2u:15167: tathocyamāne pramāṇānāṃ tattvāvedakatvamatharkriyāyāḥ sattvamasati tadabhāva ityādi bahu saṃvidheyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15182: tacca vyāpakamanabhyupagamapramāṇābhāvābhyāṃ jagato vyāvartamānaṃ svavyāpyaṃ bādhyatvamiti vyāvartayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:15186: satyatvapratyakṣasya pratikūlatvena ca parotprekṣitaṃ tarkamapi nirākartumāśaṅkate- bheda iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15194: yadi prapañco sāṃvṛto na syāttadā pratyakṣo 'pyasau na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15200: bhedo hi pratīyamāno ghaṭapaṭau bhinnāviti ghaṭapaṭayovirśeṣaṇatayā,
GSP33nysu__2u:15201: ghaṭapaṭayorbheda iti tābhyāṃ viśeṣyatayā vā pratyetavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15204: ghaṭātpaṭasya bheda iti vā ghaṭapratiyogitayā paṭadharmikatayā ca bhedagrahaṇameṣyavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15206: viśeṣyayorghaṭapaṭayorjñāne sati hi tadviśeṣaṇatayā bhedo jñātavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15207: nahi devadattādarśane daṇḍasya tadviśeṣaṇatayā darśanaṃ yujyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:15219: ato vāstavatve bhedasya pratītyanupapattau prapañcasyāpi tadāpatteravicāritaramaṇīyaḥ saṃvṛtibhaya evāyamaṅgīkaraṇīya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:15228: yat yasmādbhedo vastunaḥ svarūpaṃ tasmāt tasya vastuno gra(he)
GSP33nysu__2u:15231: tathāca kvānyonyāśrayatvaṃ yena bhedo durgrahaḥ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:15234: yasmādvastuno grahe tasya bhedasyāgraho nāsti tasmādbhedo vastunaḥ svarūpamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15236: vimato bhedo ghaṭasvarūpaṃ bhavitumarhati ghaṭagrahe 'gṛhyamāṇatvarahitatvāt ghaṭasvarūpavadeveti /
GSP33nysu__2u:15237: yadi atra tasya grahe gṛhyamāṇatvādityevocyeta tadā ghaṭapaṭāviti ghaṭajñānena jñāyamānena paṭenānaikāntikatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15239: nahi ghaṭagrahe gṛhyamāṇo 'pi paṭo ghaṭagrahe sarvathā gṛhyata eveti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__2u:15240: yajjñāne yatsarvathopalabhyate tattatsvarūpamiti vyāptāvucyamānāyāṃ daṇḍijñāne daṇḍo 'pyavaśyaṃ sphuratyeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:15243: kiñca viśiṣṭaṃ nāma viśeṣaṇasambandhanimitto viśeṣyasyākārabheda iti pī na viśiṣṭapratyaye viśeṣaṇasphuraṇamasti /
GSP33nysu__2u:15246: yadvā ghaṭabhedau pakṣīkṛtya niyamenānyatarapratītāvanyatarasya sphuraṇenānyonyābhinnatvaṃ sādhyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15259: anyathāsyāmunā bheda iti vaktuṃ na yujyate // MAnuv_2,2.223cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:15261: yadi bhedo vastupratītau na pratīyeta tadāsyāmunā bheda ityuttarakālaṃ savikalpaka(vi)
GSP33nysu__2u:15273: na kevalaṃ vastudarśane bhedasphuraṇamanabhyupagacchato 'syāmunā bheda iti paścātkālīnaṃ savikalpakajñānaṃ tathā vyavahāraśca nopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:15279: nantaraṃ smaryamāṇaro gṛhyamāṇo vā pratiyogī paṭo 'pi vinā bhedenopalabdhavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15281: tathā cottarakālaṃ svasmātsvayaṃ bhinna iti savikalpako bhedagrahaḥ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:15286: paṭādghaṭo bhinna ityeva hi savikalpikā pratītiranubhūyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:15288: ataḥ pratītivirodhādevaṃvidhaḥ savikalpakagraho nāṅgīkartumucita iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15289: kiñca yadi svasvātsvayaṃ bhinna iti savikalpako bhedagrahaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15299: kadāpi kasyacidapi tathā vyavahārābhāvena viparītavyavahāreṇa ca sarvapratītisiddheriti /
GSP33nysu__2u:15314: tatra dhamirṇo bhedena pratipannasya vā pratiyogitā, anyathā vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:15317: ādye pratiyogisvarūpabhedapratītau dharmiṇaḥ pratiyogitāyāṃ sa eva nyāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15320: vastuto 'nyonyapratiyogikayorghaṭapaṭasvarūpabhedayoḥ pratītayoḥ satorasati sādṛśyādau pratibandhake 'nyonyapratiyogikatayā viśiṣṭabhedapratītau bādhakābhāvāditi / *8,321*
GSP33nysu__2u:15322: evaṃ svamatena bhedapratītāvanyonyāśrayatvaṃ parihṛtya bhinnabhedavādināṃ parihāramāha- dharmitveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15324: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca tadbhāvaścaiva gṛhyate // MAnuv_2,2.225 //
GSP33nysu__2u:15348: nanu yatra pratiyogī paścātpratīyate tatra yugapadavabhāso nāstīti taddṛṣṭāntena sarvatrāpyevamanumīyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:15363: ekasyāmeva nirvikalpikāyāṃ saṃvidi bhedasya bhedinośca yugapadavabhāsane sati tatraikaṃ bhedinamava(dhiṃ kṛtvai)
GSP33nysu__2u:15373: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena grahaṇamapi na dharmipratiyogiprakārādbhidyata iti vaiśeṣikaparīkṣāyāmuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15381: kimatra yadi dharmyādipratītyapekṣayā bhedaḥ pratīyeta tadānyonyāśrayatvaṃ syādi(tyā)
GSP33nysu__2u:15383: kiṃvā yadi bhedaḥ pratīyeta tadānyonyāśrayatvaṃ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:15385: ... bhedaḥ kathaṃ grāhya iti yaḥ paripṛcchati /
GSP33nysu__2u:15397: bhedo durgraha iti pratijñāya tadupapattaye hīdamucyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:15398: anena ca yadi bhedo dharmyādipratītimapekṣya pratīyeta tadānyonyāśrayatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15399: tathāca na pratīyetetyāpādanena pratīyate cāto na dharmyādigrahaṇāpekṣā tatpratītiriti labdhaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:15404: kiṃ pareṇa kvāpi bhedo na gṛhītaḥ kiṃvā kvacidgṛhīta iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:15408: yadyanyatvaṃ kvāpi na gṛhītaṃ tadānyonyāśrayatvāpādanameva na śakyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15413: anyatvaṃ yadi siddhaṃ syāt kathamanyonyasaṃśrayaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.228cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:15419: asti bhedapratītiḥ sā na prameti tu tātparyamiti cenna kimanyonyāśrayatvamanyonyotpādaṃ pratibadhanātīti mataṃ,
GSP33nysu__2u:15427: sāṃvṛta iti yebhyastantubhyo jātasteṣāmeva kāraṇaṃ bha(va)viṣyatīti / *8,331*
GSP33nysu__2u:15429: nanvanenāsya tarkasya kiṃ dūṣaṇamuktaṃ syādityata āha- etādṛśasyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15433: na kevalametajjātyuttaraṃ kintu yadanyadapi tadīyaṃ vacanam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15439: tathā na tāvatpratyakṣeṇa bheda eva dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:15448: tathā sattāvatkāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇe sattā vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:15462: na māyāvādo 'pi nirasto veditavya ityatideśajñāpanāya māyī cetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15465: nanvetadanyonyāśrayatvādikaṃ sūtrakṛtaiva kuto na nirākṛtamityata āha- taditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:15471: sadalameva pūrvapakṣivacanaṃ nirākartavyaṃ bhavati na nirdalam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15480: yacchūnyavādinaḥ śūnyaṃ tadeva brahma māyinaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.230ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:15490: nanu nirviśeṣatvena bāhyalakṣaṇabhedābhāve 'pi satyajñānānantānandātmakatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ māyāvādināṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15508: yatpunaruktaṃ dṛśyatvasya satyatve tatraiva vyabhicāraprasaṅgāttasya mithyātvaṃ vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15526: ata e(vai)tadviṣaye sadvādinaḥ kimapi kṛtyaṃ nāstyeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:15535: tadubhayaṃ sūtre na dṛśyata ityata āha- ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15540: nanvanuktasamuccayārthena caśabdenedaṃ dūṣaṇadvayaṃ sūcitamiti yathā vyākhyāyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:15552: bahusthaleṣu gṛhīteyaṃ vyāptirityato na vyabhicāramarhatīti pūrvapakṣiṇo 'bhimānaṃ sūcayituṃ sūtrakāreṇādipadaṃ prayuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15553: tathāpi prayogavelāyāmeka eva dṛṣṭānta upādeyo 'nyathā'dhikyaṃ prasa(jyate)jyeteti /
GSP33nysu__2u:15573: nanu jñeyamapi rūpādikaṃ pratyakṣādisiddhaṃ tatkathaṃ vijñānameva tattvamityata āha- akhileti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15576: kuto jñeyasya jñānātmakatvamityata āha- prabhāsata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15578: tena prakāśamānatvasya jñānatvena vyāptau siddhāyāṃ nīlāderapi prakāśamānasya jñānatvaṃ siddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15586: vijñānasantatīnāṃ bhedasya ekaikasyāpi santatau vijñānabhedasya ca vidyamānatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15589: tenaiva vijñānasya sadvitīyatvāprāpternaikatvamupapadyata ityata āha- tatreti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15590: tatra santatibhedaśca svabhedo bheda eva ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:15614: kiṃ jñeyaṃ svarūpeṇāsadeva vijñāne samāropitaṃ vijñānātmaka(mityu)
GSP33nysu__2u:15615: mucyate, kiṃ vā paramārthasata eva jñeyasya jagato vijñānātmakatvaṃ bhedamātraṃ tvasaditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:15644: anumānavirodhaṃ cānumānasya pratipādayituṃ sūtram oṃ kṣaṇikatvācca oṃ //
GSP33nysu__2u:15657: atra kṣaṇikatvākṣaṇikatvalakṣaṇaviruddhadharmādhyāsaṃ bhedahetuṃ vadatā'ntarabāhyatvādiraneko viruddhadharmasaṃsarga upalakṣito boddhavyaḥ / *8,354*
GSP33nysu__2u:15659: evaṃ pratyekaṃ nirākṛtāni bauddhamatāni sādhāraṇadoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ sūtram- oṃ savarthānupapatteśca oṃ //
GSP33nysu__2u:15700: te ca jīvāstikāyo dharmāstikāyo 'dharmāstikāyaḥ pudgalāstikāya ākāśāstikāya iti pañca /
GSP33nysu__2u:15701: atra ca mokṣopayoginaḥ sapta padārthā jīvājīvāsravabandhanirjarasaṃvaramokṣāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15729: atra saptabhaṅgitvanirāsārthaṃ naikasminnasambhavāditi sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- naitaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:15730: naitat padārtha ekasmin yuktaṃ dṛṣṭivirodhataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.237ab // *8,363*
GSP33nysu__2u:15743: nanvekāntadarśanasya mithyādṛṣṭitvena na tadvirodho 'sambhavamāhavatītyata āha- bhāveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:15745: tadrūpameva taditi niyamaḥ kena vāryate // MAnuv_2,2.237c-f //
GSP33nysu__2u:15751: athavā yena bhāvābhāvatayā rūpeṇeti sāmānādhikaraṇyena yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:15756: yadi dṛṣṭasya niyamasya nivārakamanekāntasādhakaṃ prabalapramāṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15758: naca bādhakena vinā pratyayānāṃ mithyātvaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktamatiprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:15763: sadvādino hi sattvaṃ viśvasya pramāṇaiḥ prātiṣṭhipastadanaṅgīkāre doṣāṃśca nyarūpayan /
GSP33nysu__2u:15765: tathānye 'pi svapakṣasādhanaṃ tadanabhyupagame bādhanaṃ ca kṛtavantaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15767: tvaṃ nāṅgīkriyate tadā tu tadupanyastaṃ pramāṇamuparudhyeta dūṣaṇaṃ cānuṣajyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:15769: atastaddoṣaparihārārthaṃ tattatpramāṇānusaraṇārthaṃ ca tattadātmatā viśvasya mayā svīkṛtā /
GSP33nysu__2u:15782: sadvādino hi na kevalaṃ sattve pramāṇaṃ tadanaṅgīkāre ca dūṣaṇaṃ ca vyutpādya nivṛttāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15784: evamasadvādino 'pi nāsattve pramāṇaṃ tadanabhyupagame bādhakaṃ cābhidhāyaivoparatā,
GSP33nysu__2u:15796: tathā cāṅgīkāraparityāgābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣṭo 'yaṃ kaṣṭāṃ daśāmāviṣyaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:15800: akramānekānte 'pi yena rūpeṇa nityatvaṃ tenaivānityatvamityādyanaṅgīkārānna virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15801: tathāca saptabhaṅgayaṅgīkāriṇā mayā tāni pramāṇāni dūṣaṇāni ca vyavasthāpitāni bhavantīti noktadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:15814: kiñca sarvāṅgīkārapakṣe syādasti ca nāsti ceti pakṣātsyādasti syānnāstīti pakṣadvayaṃ na bhidyate /

GSP33nysu__2u:19618: tatra kaḥ sṛṣṭau krama ityatastaṃ darśayanviyadadhikaraṇatātparyamāha- prakṛtiriti //
GSP33nysu__2u:19624: tato jātaḥ pumān nāma brahmāsyāṃ vāsudevataḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:19625: sūtrātmā prāṇanāmā ca devyau prakṛtimāninī // MAnuv_2,3.90 //
GSP33nysu__2u:19626: tato rūpaṃ mahān nāma brahmaṇo 'haṅkṛtiḥ śivaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:19628: skandaśca tata evānye sarve devāḥ prajajñire // MAnuv_2,3.91 //
GSP33nysu__2u:19631: tataḥ kaḥ sṛṣṭau krama ityatastaṃ darśayanviyadadhikaraṇatātparyamāha- prakṛtiriti //
GSP33nysu__2u:19642: tatra pūrvatanaḥ śreyān guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samastaśaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.92ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:19682: yadyapi caturthapāde 'pi śrutivacanānāṃ parasparavirodha eva parihriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:19691: tathāpyarthanirṇayāyaiva pādārambho na prāmāṇyanirṇayāyāto na mīmāṃsātvahaniriti darśayitumartha ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:19692: yadyapi yuktayaḥ pūrvapāde 'pi santi tathāpyāgamagṛhītavyāptyādimattvenātra prabalā iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:19693: pāramārthike virodhe niṇaryo duṣkara ityata ivetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:19699: yuktisahitaśrutibhiḥ pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ śrutimātreṇa tadviparītārthanirṇaya ityata uktam- suviśiṣyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:19701: tathā prāṇā ityādīnāṃ sūtrāṇāṃ bhāṣya evārtho vispaṣṭa ityataḥ pūrvottarapa(kṣīyayu)
